  7607                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7609                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7610                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7611                                  
  7612                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7613                                  
  7614                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7615                                  
  7616                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7617                                  
  7618                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7619                                  
  7620                                  ;************************************************************************
  7621                                  ;*									*
  7622                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7623                                  ;*									*
  7624                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7625                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7626                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7627                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7628                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7629                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7630                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7631                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7632                                  ;*									*
  7633                                  ;************************************************************************
  7634                                  
  7635                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7636                                  		;db 0
  7637                                  
  7638                                  		; 13/12/202
  7639 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7640                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7641 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7642                                  					; 00 init
  7643 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7644 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7645 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7646                                  					; 03
  7647 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7648                                  					; 04
  7649 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7650                                  					; 05
  7651 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7652 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7653                                  					; 07
  7654 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7655                                  					; 08
  7656 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7657 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7658                                  con_table_end:
  7659 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7660                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7661 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7662 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7663 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7664 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7665 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7666                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7667 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7668                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7669 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7670 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7671 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7672 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7673 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7674 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7675 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7676 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7677 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  7678 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  7679 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  7680 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  7681 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  7682 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  7683 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  7684 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  7685 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  7686 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  7687 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  7688 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  7689                                  prn_table_end:
  7690 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  7691                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  7692 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  7693 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7694 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7695 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7696 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  7697 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  7698 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7699 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  7700 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  7701 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  7702 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  7703                                  aux_table_end:
  7704 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  7705                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  7706 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  7707 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7708 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7709 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7710 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  7711 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7712 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7713 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7714 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  7715 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  7716                                  tim_table_end:
  7717                                  
  7718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7719                                  
  7720                                  ;************************************************************************
  7721                                  ;*									*
  7722                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  7723                                  ;*									*
  7724                                  ;************************************************************************
  7725                                  
  7726                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  7727                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  7728 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  7729                                  con_loop:				
  7730 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  7731 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  7732 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  7733                                  con_exit:				
  7734 00000163 F8                      		clc
  7735 00000164 C3                      		retn
  7736                                  
  7737                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7738                                  
  7739                                  ;************************************************************************
  7740                                  ;*									*
  7741                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  7742                                  ;*									*
  7743                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  7744                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  7745                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  7746                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  7747                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  7748                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  7749                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  7750                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  7751                                  ;*									*
  7752                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  7753                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  7754                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  7755                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  7756                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  7757                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  7758                                  ;*									*
  7759                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  7760                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  7761                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  7762                                  ;*									*
  7763                                  ;************************************************************************
  7764                                  
  7765                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7766                                  chrin:		
  7767 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  7768 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  7769 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  7770 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  7771 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  7772 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  7773 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  7774 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  7775 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  7776 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  7777 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  7778 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  7779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7780                                  
  7781                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  7782                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  7783                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  7784                                  ;	 goto keyret
  7785                                  ;      else
  7786                                  ;	 set al to zero
  7787                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  7788                                  ;      endif
  7789                                  ;    endif
  7790                                  ;  endif
  7791                                  
  7792                                  alt_ext_chk:
  7793 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  7794 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  7795 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  7796 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  7797 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  7798 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  7799 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  7800 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  7801                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7802                                  
  7803                                  not_ext:				
  7804 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  7805 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  7806                                  alt_save:				
  7807 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  7808                                  keyret:					
  7809 0000019D C3                      		retn
  7810                                  
  7811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7812                                  
  7813                                  ;************************************************************************
  7814                                  ;*									*
  7815                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  7816                                  ;*									*
  7817                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  7818                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  7819                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  7820                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  7821                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  7822                                  ;*									*
  7823                                  ;************************************************************************
  7824                                  
  7825                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7826                                  con_rdnd:				
  7827 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  7828 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  7829 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  7830 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  7831 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  7832 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  7833 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  7834 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  7835 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7836                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7837 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  7838                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  7839 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  7840 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  7841 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  7842 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  7843                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  7844                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  7845                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  7846                                  z_bus_exit:				
  7847 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  7848 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  7849 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  7850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7851                                  
  7852                                  gotchr:					
  7853 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  7854 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  7855 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  7856 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  7857 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  7858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7859                                  
  7860                                  notbrk:					
  7861 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  7862 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  7863 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  7864 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  7865                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7866                                  
  7867                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  7868 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  7869 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  7870 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  7871 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  7872 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  7873 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  7874 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  7875                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  7876                                  rdexit:					
  7877 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7878 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  7879                                  					; return keyboard character here
  7880                                  bc_exvec:				
  7881 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7882                                  					; indicate normal termination
  7883 000001FA C3                      		retn
  7884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7885                                  
  7886                                  ;************************************************************************
  7887                                  ;*									*
  7888                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  7889                                  ;*									*
  7890                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  7891                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  7892                                  ;*									*
  7893                                  ;************************************************************************
  7894                                  
  7895                                  con_writ:
  7896                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  7897 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  7898                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7899                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  7900                                  con_lp:					
  7901 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  7902 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  7903 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  7904                                  					; AL = character to display
  7905 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  7906                                  cc_ret:					
  7907 00000205 F8                      		clc
  7908 00000206 C3                      		retn
  7909                                  
  7910                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7911                                  
  7912                                  ;************************************************************************
  7913                                  ;*									*
  7914                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  7915                                  ;*									*
  7916                                  ;************************************************************************
  7917                                  
  7918                                  con_flush:
  7919 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  7920                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  7921 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7922 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  7923                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  7924                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  7925                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  7926 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  7927 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  7928 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  7929                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  7930 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  7931                                  
  7932                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7933                                  
  7934                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7935                                  
  7936                                  ;************************************************************************
  7937                                  ;*									*
  7938                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  7939                                  ;*									*
  7940                                  ;************************************************************************
  7941                                  
  7942                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  7943                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  7944                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  7947                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  7948                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  7949                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  7950                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  7951                                  ;
  7952                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  7953                                  
  7954                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7955                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  7956                                  
  7957                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7958                                  
  7959                                  ;************************************************************************
  7960                                  ;*									*
  7961                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  7962                                  ;*									*
  7963                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  7964                                  ;*									*
  7965                                  ;************************************************************************
  7966                                  
  7967                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  7968 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  7969                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  7970                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7971                                  prn_done:
  7972 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  7973 0000021C C3                      		retn
  7974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7975                                  
  7976                                  ;************************************************************************
  7977                                  ;*									*
  7978                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  7979                                  ;*									*
  7980                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  7981                                  ;*									*
  7982                                  ;************************************************************************
  7983                                  
  7984                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  7985                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  7986 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  7987                                  prn_loop:				
  7988 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  7989                                  prn_out:				
  7990 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  7991 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  7992 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  7993 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  7994 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  7995 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  7996 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  7997 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  7998 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  7999 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8000 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8002                                  
  8003                                  _prnwf:					
  8004 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8005 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8006                                  TestPrnError:				
  8007 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8008 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8009                                  pmessg:					
  8010 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8011                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8012                                  
  8013                                  prn_con:				
  8014 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8015 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8016                                  ;prn_done:				
  8017                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8018                                  prn_done2:
  8019                                  		;clc
  8020                                  		; cf=0
  8021 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8023                                  
  8024                                  ;************************************************************************
  8025                                  ;*									*
  8026                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8027                                  ;*									*
  8028                                  ;************************************************************************
  8029                                  
  8030                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8031 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8032 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8033 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8034                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8035                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8036 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8037 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8039                                  
  8040                                  ;************************************************************************
  8041                                  ;*									*
  8042                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8043                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8044                                  ;*									*
  8045                                  ;************************************************************************
  8046                                  
  8047                                  prnstat:				
  8048 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8049                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8050                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8051                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8052                                  
  8053                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8054                                  
  8055                                  ;************************************************************************
  8056                                  ;*									*
  8057                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8058                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8059                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8060                                  ;*									*
  8061                                  ;************************************************************************
  8062                                  
  8063                                  prnop:	
  8064 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8065 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8066                                  
  8067                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8068                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8069                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8070                                  
  8071 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8072 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8073 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8074 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8075 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8076 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8077 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8078                                  
  8079                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8080                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8081                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8082                                  
  8083                                  NextTest:				
  8084 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8085                                  					; i/o error?
  8086 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8087                                  
  8088                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8089                                  
  8090 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8091                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8092 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8093 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8094 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8095                                  ret1:					
  8096 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8098                                  
  8099                                  checknotready:				
  8100 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8101 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8102 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8103                                  
  8104                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8105                                  
  8106                                  ;************************************************************************
  8107                                  ;*									*
  8108                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8109                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8110                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8111                                  ;*									*
  8112                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8113                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8114                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8115                                  ;*									*
  8116                                  ;************************************************************************
  8117                                  
  8118                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8119                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8120 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8121                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8122 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8123 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8124 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8125 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8126 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8127                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8128 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8129 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8130                                  prn_getstat:				
  8131 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8132 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8133 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8134 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8135 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8136 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8137 000002A6 26                      		es
  8138 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8139                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8140                                  					; lodsb
  8141 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8142 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8143 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8144 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8145                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8146                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8147                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8148 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8149                                  
  8150                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8151                                  
  8152                                  prn_bperr:				
  8153 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8154                                  prn_berr:				
  8155 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8157                                  
  8158                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8159                                  
  8160                                  ;************************************************************************
  8161                                  ;*									*
  8162                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8163                                  ;*									*
  8164                                  ;************************************************************************
  8165                                  
  8166                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8167                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8168                                  
  8169                                  ;********************************;*
  8170                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8171                                  ;********************************;*
  8172                                  
  8173                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8174                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8175                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8176                                  
  8177                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8178                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8179                                  ;;endstruc
  8180                                  
  8181                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8182                                  
  8183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8184                                  
  8185                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8186                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8187 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8188 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8189                                  					; ioc_pc
  8190 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8191                                  
  8192                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8193 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8194                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8195                                  
  8196                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8197 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8198 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8199 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8200                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8201 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8202 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8203                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8204 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8205 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8206 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8207 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8208 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8209 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8210                                  prngetcount:				
  8211                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8212 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8213 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8214                                  					; return current retry count
  8215                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8216                                  		; cf=0
  8217                                  		;clc
  8218 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8219                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8220                                  
  8221                                  ;************************************************************************
  8222                                  ;*									*
  8223                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8224                                  ;*									*
  8225                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8226                                  ;************************************************************************
  8227                                  
  8228                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8229 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]

  8231                                  					; ioc_pc
  8232 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8233 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8234 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8235 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8236 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8237 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
