  9650                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
  9651                                  				; (20/09/2022)
  9652 00000769 C3                      		retn
  9653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9654                                  
  9655                                  mmi_not_ext:				
  9656 0000076A F9                      		stc
  9657 0000076B C3                      		retn
  9658                                  
  9659                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9660                                  
  9661                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9662                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9663                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
  9664                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
  9665                                  ; output:
  9666                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
  9667                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
  9668                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9669                                  
  9670                                  readfat:	
  9671                                  		;mov	dh, 0
  9672                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9673 0000076C 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  9674 0000076E B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
  9675                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
  9676 00000771 E80500                  		call	read_sector
  9677 00000774 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
  9678 00000776 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
  9679                                  bad_fat_ret:				
  9680 00000778 C3                      		retn
  9681                                  
  9682                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9683                                  
  9684                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9685                                  
  9686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9687                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
  9688                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
  9689                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
  9690                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
  9691                                  ;		dh has head
  9692                                  ;		es:di has bds
  9693                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
  9694                                  ;
  9695                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
  9696                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
  9697                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
  9698                                  ;
  9699                                  ;		carry set
  9700                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
  9701                                  ;
  9702                                  ; register bp is preserved.
  9703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9704                                  
  9705                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9706                                  
  9707                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9708                                  read_sector:	
  9709 00000779 55                      		push	bp
  9710 0000077A BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
  9711 0000077D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9712 00000781 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
  9713                                  rd_ret:					
  9714 00000784 06                      		push	es
  9715 00000785 1E                      		push	ds
  9716 00000786 07                      		pop	es
  9717 00000787 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  9718 0000078A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  9719                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  9720                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  9721                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  9722 0000078C 07                      		pop	es
  9723 0000078D 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
  9724                                  rd_rty:					
  9725 0000078F E87604                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
  9726 00000792 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
  9727 00000794 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9728                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9729                                  					; fnon_removable
  9730 00000799 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
  9731 0000079B 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
  9732 000007A0 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
  9733 000007A2 50                      		push	ax

  9884                                  
  9885                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
  9886                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
  9887                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
  9888                                  
  9889                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
  9890                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
  9891                                  ;
  9892                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
  9893                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
  9894                                  
  9895                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9896                                  checksingle:		
  9897 0000083B 50                      		push	ax
  9898 0000083C 53                      		push	bx
  9899 0000083D 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9900                                  
  9901                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
  9902                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
  9903                                  
  9904 00000841 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
  9905 00000844 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
  9906 00000846 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
  9907                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
  9908 00000849 746E                    		jz	short singleret
  9909                                  
  9910                                  
  9911                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
  9912                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
  9913                                  
  9914 0000084B 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9915                                  					; get physical drive number
  9916 0000084F 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
  9917 00000850 57                      		push	di
  9918 00000851 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
  9919                                  scan_list:				
  9920 00000855 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
  9921 00000859 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
  9922 0000085B B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
  9923 0000085D 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
  9924 00000861 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
  9925 00000863 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
  9926 00000867 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
  9927 00000868 07                      		pop	es
  9928 00000869 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
  9929                                  
  9930                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
  9931                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
  9932                                  ; in this case.
  9933 0000086D 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
  9934 00000872 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
  9935                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
  9936 00000874 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
  9937 00000879 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
  9938 0000087B 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
  9939                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
  9940                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
  9941 0000087F 06                      		push	es
  9942 00000880 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
  9943 00000884 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
  9944                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
  9945                                  					; set up sdsb
  9946 00000888 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
  9947 00000889 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
  9948                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9949                                  
  9950                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
  9951                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
  9952                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
  9953                                  
  9954                                  not_fsetowner:				
  9955 0000088B 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
  9956 00000890 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
  9957 00000892 50                      		push	ax
  9958 00000893 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
  9959 00000897 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  9960 00000899 06                      		push	es
  9961 0000089A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
  9962 0000089E 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
  9963                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
  9964                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
  9965 000008A3 07                      		pop	es
  9966 000008A4 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
  9967 000008A6 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
  9968 000008A7 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
  9969                                  ignore_sdsb:				
  9970 000008A9 E8800E                  		call	swpdsk
  9971 000008AC EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
  9972                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9973                                  
  9974                                  scan_skip:	
  9975 000008AE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
  9976                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  9977                                  					; go to	next bds
  9978 000008B1 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
  9979 000008B4 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
  9980 000008B6 F9                      		stc
  9981 000008B7 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
  9982 000008B8 07                      		pop	es

 10001                                  
 10002                                  ioret:		
 10003 000008C3 C3                      		retn
 10004                                  
 10005                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10006                                  
 10007                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10008                                  
 10009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10010                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10011                                  ;
 10012                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10013                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10014                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10015                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10016                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10017                                  ;	ds = cs
 10018                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10019                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10020                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10021                                  ;
 10022                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10023                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10025                                  
 10026                                  diskrd:	
 10027                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10028                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10029 000008C4 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10030                                  
 10031                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10032                                  
 10033                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10034                                  diskio:
 10035 000008C9 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10036 000008CB 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10037 000008CF E8F9FB                  		call	SetDrive
 10038 000008D2 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10039 000008D6 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10040                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10041 000008D9 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10042                                  
 10043                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10044                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10045                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10046                                  
 10047 000008DB 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10048                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10049                                  					; unformatted_media
 10050 000008E0 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10051 000008E2 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10052 000008E6 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10053                                  
 10054                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10055                                  
 10056 000008EA 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10057 000008EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10058 000008EE 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10059 000008F0 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10060 000008F3 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10061                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10062 000008F8 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10063 000008FA 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10064 000008FD 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10065 000008FF 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10066 00000903 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10067 00000905 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10069                                  
 10070                                  sanity32:				
 10071 00000907 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10072 0000090B 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10073 0000090F 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10074 00000911 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10075 00000913 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10076 00000917 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10077                                  
 10078                                  sanityok:				
 10079 00000919 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10080 0000091D 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10081 00000921 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10082                                  
 10083                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10084                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10085                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10086                                  
 10087 00000925 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10088                                  
 10089                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10090                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10091                                  
 10092 00000928 06                      		push	es
 10093 00000929 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10094 0000092D 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10095                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10096                                  					; current disk parm table
 10097 00000932 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10098 00000936 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10099 0000093A 07                      		pop	es
 10100 0000093B 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10101                                  					; fnon_removable
 10102 00000940 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10103 00000942 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10104                                  
 10105                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10106                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10107                                  ; the proper error code.
 10108                                  
 10109 00000945 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 10110 0000094A 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 10111 0000094C E8AB0E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 10112                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 10113                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 10114 0000094F E84700                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 10115                                  
 10116                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 10117                                  
 10118                                  skip_setup:
 10119                                  
 10120                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 10121                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 10122                                  				
 10123 00000952 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10124 00000954 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10125 00000956 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10126                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 10127 0000095A A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10128 0000095D A1[2D05]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 10129 00000960 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10130                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 10131                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 10132                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10133 00000964 42                      		inc	dx
 10134 00000965 8816[3101]              		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 10135 00000969 268B4D15                		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 10136                                  					; get number of	heads
 10137 0000096D 50                      		push	ax
 10138 0000096E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10139 00000970 A1[2905]                		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 10140 00000973 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10141 00000975 A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10142 00000978 58                      		pop	ax
 10143 00000979 F7F1                    		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 10144 0000097B 833E[2905]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 10145 00000980 7714                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10146 00000982 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 10147 00000985 770F                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10148 00000987 8816[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head
 10149 0000098B A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 10150                                  
 10151                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 10152                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 10153                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.

 10169                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------

 10376                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]

 10380                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.

 10589 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10590 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10591 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10592 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10593 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10594 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10595 00000BCB C3                      		retn

 10598                                  notready:

 10602                                  
 10603                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10604                                  
 10605                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10606                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10607                                  
 10608                                  maperror:	
 10609 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10610 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10611 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10612 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10613 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10614 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10615 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10616                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10617 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10618 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10619                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10620 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10621                                  					; get translation
 10622                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10623                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10624 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10625 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10626 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10627 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10628                                  
 10629                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10630                                  
 10631                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10632                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10633                                  
 10634                                  set_tim:		
 10635 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10636 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10637                                  
 10638                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10639                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10640                                  
 10641 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10642 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10643 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10644                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10645                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10646 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 10647                                  setaccess:				
 10648 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 10649 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10650 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10651                                  done_set:				
 10652 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 10653                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 10654 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 10655 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 10656                                  
 10657                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10658                                  
 10659                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 10660                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 10661                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 10662                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 10663                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 10664                                  
 10665                                  again:	
 10666 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 10667 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 10668 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 10669                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 10670 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 10671 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 10672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10673                                  
 10674                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 10675 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 10676 00000C14 C3                      		retn

 10782                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10783                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 10784                                  ;
 10785                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 10786                                  ;
 10787                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 10788                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 10789                                  ;	subfunctions.
 10790                                  ;
 10791                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10792                                  
 10793                                  ; 11/03/2019
 10794                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10795                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 10796 00000C45 E883F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 10797 00000C48 06                      		push	es
 10798 00000C49 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 10799 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 10800                                  					; RAWIO
 10801 00000C52 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 10802 00000C56 07                      		pop	es
 10803 00000C57 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 10804                                  
 10805                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 10806                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 10807                                  
 10808                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10809 00000C59 BE[160C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 10810                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 10811                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 10812 00000C5C A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 10813 00000C5E 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 10814                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10815 00000C60 BE[290C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 10816                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 10817                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 10818                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 10819 00000C63 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 10820 00000C65 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 10821 00000C67 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 10822 00000C6A 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 10823 00000C6C 98                      		cbw
 10824 00000C6D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 10825 00000C6F 46                      		inc	si
 10826 00000C70 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 10827 00000C72 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 10828                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 10829 00000C75 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 10830                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 10831                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 10832 00000C7A B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 10833 00000C7C C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 10834                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10835                                  
 10836                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 10837                                  		; as a fall through from above
 10838                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 10839 00000C7D 5A                      		pop	dx

 10847                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10848                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 10849                                  ;
 10850                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 10851                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 10852                                  ;
 10853                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 10854                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 10855                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 10856                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 10857                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10858                                  
 10859                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10860                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 10861                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 10862                                  
 10863 00000C81 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 10864 00000C85 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 10865                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 10866 00000C88 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 10867 00000C8C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 10868 00000C8F 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10869 00000C93 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 10870                                  					; Mask off other bits
 10871 00000C96 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 10872 00000C99 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 10873 00000C9D 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 10874 00000CA0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 10875 00000CA2 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 10876                                  					
 10877                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 10878 00000CA5 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 10879 00000CA8 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 10880                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 10881 00000CAB 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 10882 00000CAD 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 10883 00000CAE 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 10884                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 10885                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 10886                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 10887 00000CB3 E885FB                  		call	checksingle
 10888 00000CB6 E83EF9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 10889 00000CB9 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 10890 00000CBA 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 10891 00000CBC 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 10892                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 10893                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 10894 00000CBF 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 10895                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 10896 00000CC2 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 10897                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 10898 00000CC5 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 10899 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 10900 00000CC7 1F                      		pop	ds
 10901 00000CC8 07                      		pop	es
 10902 00000CC9 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10903                                  		
 10904                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10905                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 10906                                  		;clc
 10907                                  GetParmRet:

 11069                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11070                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11071                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11072                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11073                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11074                                  ;
 11075                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11076                                  ;
 11077                                  ; output:
 11078                                  ;	for status call:
 11079                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11080                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11081                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11082                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11083                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11084                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11085                                  ;
 11086                                  ;	for format track:
 11087                                  ;		carry set if error
 11088                                  ;
 11089                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11241                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been

 11243                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the

 11245                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 11354                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11355                                  
 11356                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11357                                  
 11358                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11359                                  ;
 11360                                  ; TrackIo:
 11361                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11362                                  ;
 11363                                  ;   input:
 11364                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11365                                  ;		  3 = write
 11366                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11367                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11368                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11369                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11370                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11371                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11372                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11373                                  ;
 11374                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11375                                  
 11376                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11377                                  		
 11378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11379                                  TrackIo:	
 11380                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11381 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11382 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11383 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11384                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11385 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11386 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11387 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11388 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11389 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11390 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11391                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11392 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11393 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11394 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11395 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11396                                  
 11397                                  		; WE WANT:
 11398                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11399                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11400                                  		
 11401 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11402                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11403 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11404                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11405                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11406 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11407                                  		
 11408 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11409                                  ionextsector:				
 11410 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11411 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11412 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11413 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11414                                  					; the track table
 11415 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11416 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11417                                  
 11418                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11419                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11420                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11421                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11422                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11423                                  		
 11424                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11425 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11426                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11427                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11428 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11429                                  		; 12/12/2022

 11479                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11480                                  
 11481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11482                                  ;
 11483                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11484                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11485                                  ; are permissible.
 11486                                  ;
 11487                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11488                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11489                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11490                                  ;
 11491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11492                                  
 11493                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:

 11495                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11496 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11497 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11498 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11500                                  
 11501                                  OneK:

 11503 00000F7B C3                      		retn

 11584                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 11589                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11590                                  
 11591                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11592                                  
 11593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11594                                  ;
 11595                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11596                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11597                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11598                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11599                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11600                                  ;
 11601                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11602                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11603                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11604                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11605                                  ;
 11606                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11607                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11608                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11609                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11610                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11611                                  ;
 11612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11613                                  
 11614                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11615                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11616 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11617 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11618                                  
 11619                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11620                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11621                                  
 11622 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11623 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11624 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11625 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11626 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11627 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11629                                  
 11630                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11631 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11632 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11633 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11634 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11635                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11636                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11637 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11638 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11639                                  
 11640                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11641                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11642                                  
 11643 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]

 11645 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 11646                                  
 11647                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 11648 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11649 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 11650 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 11651 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11652 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11653 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 11654 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11655 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11656 00001029 06                      		push	es

 11659 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 11660 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 11661 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 11662                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 11663 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 11664 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11665 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 11666 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 11667 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 11668 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11669                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 11670                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 11671 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 11672 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 11673 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11674                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di

 11676                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom

 11734                                  
 11735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11736                                  ;
 11737                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 11738                                  ;
 11739                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 11740                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 11741                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 11742                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 11743                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 11744                                  ;
 11745                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11746                                  
 11747                                  ResetDisk:	
 11748 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 11749 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11750                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 11751 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 11752                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 11753 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 11754                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 11755 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 11756 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 11757                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 11758 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 11759                                  					; Zap up the speed
 11760 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 11761 00001092 C3                      		retn

 11763                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11764                                  
 11765                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11766                                  
 11767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11768                                  ;
 11769                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 11770                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 11771                                  ;
 11772                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 11773                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 11774                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 11775                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 11776                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 11777                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 11778                                  ;
 11779                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 11780                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 11781                                  ;
 11782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11783                                  
 11784                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11785                                  ToRom:	
 11786 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 11787 00001094 56                      		push	si
 11788                                  
 11789                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 11790                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 11791                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 11792                                  
 11793 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11794 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 11795 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 11796 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment

 11798                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 11799 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 11800 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11801                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 11802 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11803                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 11804                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 11805 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11806 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11807                                  		
 11808 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 11809 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11810 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]

 11812                                  					; Important for	format
 11813 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11814                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 11815                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 11816 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 11817 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 11818 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 11819                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 11820 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 11821 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 11822                                  GotValidDpt:				
 11823 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number

 11825 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 11826 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number

 11830 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 11831 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 11832 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 11833 000010EA C3                      		retn

 11836                                  
 11837                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11838                                  
 11839                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11840                                  
 11841                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11842                                  ;
 11843                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 11844                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 11845                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 11846                                  ;
 11847                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11848                                  
 11849                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11850                                  ioctl_getown:
 11851 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 11852 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11853                                  					; Get physical drive number
 11854 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 11855                                  ownloop:				
 11856 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11857 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 11858                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11859 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 11860                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11861                                  					; fi_own_physical
 11862 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 11863                                  getnextBDS:				
 11864 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 11865 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 11866                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11867                                  
 11868                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11869                                  ;
 11870                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 11871                                  ; in al to al.
 11872                                  ;

 11882                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 11883                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn

 11888                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.

 11897                                  					; fi_am_mult
