 11963                                  
 11964                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11965                                  ;	get media id
 11966                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11967                                  ;
 11968                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 11969                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 11970                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 11971                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 11972                                  ;
 11973                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 11974                                  ;
 11975                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 11976                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 11977                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 11978                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 11979                                  ;
 11980                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 11981                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 11982                                  ;
 11983                                  ; LOGIC:
 11984                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 11985                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 11986                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 11987                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 11988                                  ;
 11989                                  ; {
 11990                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 11991                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 11992                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 11993                                  ;	if (no error) then
 11994                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 11995                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 11996                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 11997                                  ;		};
 11998                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 11999                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12000                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12001                                  ;		};
 12002                                  ;	else
 12003                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12004                                  ;
 12005                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12006                                  
 12007                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12008                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12009                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12010                                  
 12011                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12012                                  GetMediaId:
 12013 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12014 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12015 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12016 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12017 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12018                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12019 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12020                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12021 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12022                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12023 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12024 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12025                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12026                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12027 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12028 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12029 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12030                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12031 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12032                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12033                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12034 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12035 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12036                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12037                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12038 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12039                                  	
 12040                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12041                                  		; cf = 0
 12042                                  		;clc
 12043                                  
 12044 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12046                                  
 12047                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12048 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12049 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12050                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12051 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12053                                  
 12054                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12055                                  
 12056                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12057                                  ;  set media id
 12058                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12059                                  
 12060                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12061                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12062                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12063                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12064                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12065                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12066                                  ;
 12067                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12068                                  ;
 12069                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12070                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12071                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12072                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12073                                  ;
 12074                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12075                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12076                                  ;
 12077                                  ; logic:
 12078                                  ;
 12079                                  ; {
 12080                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12081                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12082                                  ;	BootIo;
 12083                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12084                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12085                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12086                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12087                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12088                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12089                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12090                                  ;		};
 12091                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12092                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12093                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12094                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12095                                  ;		};
 12096                                  ;	else
 12097                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12098                                  ;
 12099                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12100                                  
 12101                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12102                                  SetMediaId:
 12103 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12104 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12105                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12106 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12107 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12108 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12109 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12110 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12111 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12112                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12113 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12114                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12115 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12116 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12117                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12118 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12119 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12120 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12121 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12122 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12123 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12124 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12125 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12126 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12127 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12128                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12129                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12130 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12131 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12132 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12133 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12134 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12135 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12136 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12137 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12138 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12139 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12140                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12141                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12142 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12144                                  
 12145                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12146 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12147 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12148                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12149 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12150                                  
 12151                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12152                                  
 12153                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12154                                  
 12155                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12156                                  ;	BootIo
 12157                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12158                                  ;
 12159                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12160                                  ;
 12161                                  ; input :
 12162                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12163                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12164                                  ;
 12165                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12166                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12167                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12168                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12169                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12170                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12171                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12172                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12173                                  ;
 12174                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12175                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12176                                  ;
 12177                                  ; logic:
 12178                                  ;
 12179                                  ; {
 12180                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12181                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12182                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12183                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12184                                  ; }
 12185                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12186                                  
 12187                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12188                                  BootIo:	
 12189 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12190 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12191 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12192 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12193 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12194                                  
 12195                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12196                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12197                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12198                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12199                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12200                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12201                                  
 12202 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12203 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12204 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12205 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12206 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12207 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12208 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12209 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12210 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12211                                  
 12212                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12213                                  
 12214                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12215                                  
 12216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12217                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12219                                  ;
 12220                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12221                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12222                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12223                                  ; history in the flags.
 12224                                  ;
 12225                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12226                                  ;
 12227                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12228                                  ;
 12229                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12230                                  ;
 12231                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12232                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12233                                  ;
 12234                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12235                                  
 12236                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12237 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12238 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12239 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12240                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12241 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12242                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12243                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12244 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12245 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12246 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12247 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12248 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12249                                  
 12250                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12251                                  
 12252 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12253 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12254                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12255                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12256 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12257 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12258 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12259                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12260                                  					; physical drive
 12261 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12262 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12263                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12264 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12265                                  
 12266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12267

 12269                                  
 12270                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12271                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12272                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12273                                  ;
 12274                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12275                                  ;
 12276                                  ; INPUT :
 12277                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12278                                  ;
 12279                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12280                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12281                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12282                                  
 12283                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12284                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12285 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12286 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12287                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12288                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12289 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12290                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12291 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12292                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12293                                  					; unformatted_media
 12294 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12295 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12296                                  
 12297                                  GafDone:				
 12298 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12299 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12301                                  
 12302                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12303                                  
 12304                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12305                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12306                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12307                                  ;
 12308                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12309                                  ;
 12310                                  ; input :
 12311                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12312                                  ;
 12313                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12314                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12315                                  
 12316                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12317                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12318 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12319 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12320                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12321 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12322                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12323                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12324 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12325 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12326                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12327 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12328                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12329                                  					; unformatted_media
 12330                                  saf_Done:				
 12331 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12332                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12333                                  
 12334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12335                                  
 12336                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12337                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12338                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12339                                  ;
 12340                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12341                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12342                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12343                                  ;
 12344                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12345                                  
 12346                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12347                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12348 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12349 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12350 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12351                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12352 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12353                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12354 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12355 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12356 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12357 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12358                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12359 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12360                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12361                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12362 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12363 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12364 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12365 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12366                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12367                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12368                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12369                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12370                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12371                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12372                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12373 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12374                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12375                                  		; cf = 0
 12376                                  		;clc
 12377 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12378                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12379                                  nosupport:				
 12380 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12381 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12387                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12388                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12389                                  ;
 12390                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12391                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12392                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12393                                  ;	    drive)
 12394                                  ;
 12395                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12396                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12397                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12400                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12401                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12402                                  ;
 12403                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12404                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12405                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12406                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12407                                  ;
 12408                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12409                                  ;
 12410                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12411                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12412                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12413                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12414                                  ; 
 12415                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12416                                  
 12417                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12418                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12419 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12420 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12421                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12422                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12423 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12424 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12425                                  		;
 12426 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12427                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12428                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12429                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12430 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12431                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12432 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12433 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12434 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12435                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12436 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12437 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12438 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12439 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12440 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12441 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12442 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12443 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12444                                  GotMediaType:				
 12445 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12446                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12447                                  		; cf = 0
 12448                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12449 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12450                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12451                                  
 12452                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12453 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12454 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12455 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12456 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12457 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12458                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12459 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12460                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12461 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12462 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12463 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12464                                  
 12465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12466                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12467                                  		;db    0
 12468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12469                                  
 12470                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12471                                  
 12472                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12473                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12474                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12475                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12476                                  
 12477                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12478                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12479                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12480                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12481                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12482                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12483                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12484                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12485                                  ;
 12486                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12487                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12488                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12489                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12492                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12493                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12494                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12495                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12496                                  ;
 12497                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12498                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12499                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12500                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12501                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12502                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12503                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12504                                  
 12505                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12506                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12507                                  
 12508                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12509                                  
 12510                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12511 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12512 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12513 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12514 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12515                                  
 12516                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12517                                  
 12518 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12519 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12520 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12521 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12522 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12524                                  
 12525                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12526 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12528                                  
 12529                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12530 000012D0 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12531 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12532                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12533                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12534                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12535 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12536                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12537                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12538                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12539                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12540                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12541 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12542 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12543 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12544 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12545                                  
 12546                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12547                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12548                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12549                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12550 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12551 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12552 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12553 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12554                                  
 12555 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12556 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12557 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12558 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12559 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 12560                                  i2f_iret:				
 12561 000012FC CF                      		iret
 12562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12563                                  
 12564                                  mine:					
 12565 000012FD 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 12566 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 12567 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 12568 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func
 12569 00001305 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 12570 00001307 EBF3                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12572                                  
 12573                                  disp_func:				
 12574 00001309 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 12575 0000130B 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 12576 0000130D 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 12577 0000130F 7424                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 12578                                  
 12579                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 12580                                  
 12581 00001311 1E                      		push	ds
 12582 00001312 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 12583                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12584                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 12585                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12586                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 12587                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 12588 00001317 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 12589 0000131B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 12590 0000131F 1F                      		pop	ds
 12591                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 12592                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12593                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 12594 00001320 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 12595                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 12596                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 12597                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 12598                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 12599                                  
 12600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12601                                  
 12602                                  do_subfun_01:				
 12603 00001325 06                      		push	es
 12604 00001326 1E                      		push	ds
 12605 00001327 1E                      		push	ds
 12606 00001328 07                      		pop	es
 12607                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12608 00001329 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 12609                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12610                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 12611 0000132E E8C303                  		call	install_bds
 12612 00001331 1F                      		pop	ds
 12613 00001332 07                      		pop	es
 12614 00001333 EBC7                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12616                                  
 12617                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 12618                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12619 00001335 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 12620                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12621 0000133A C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 12622                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 12623                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022				
 12624 0000133E EBBC                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12625                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12626                                  
 12627                                  ; 17/10/2022
 12628                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12629                                  
 12630                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 12631                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 12632                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 12633                                  
 12634                                  win386call:				
 12635 00001340 1E                      		push	ds
 12636 00001341 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12637                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12638                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 12639 00001346 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 12640                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 12641 00001348 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 12642 0000134A 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 12643                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 12644 0000134C 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 12645                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12646 0000134E F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 12647                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 12648 00001351 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 12649                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 12650 00001353 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 12651 00001358 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 12652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12653                                  
 12654                                  Win386Init:	
 12655                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12656 0000135A F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 12657                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 12658 0000135D 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 12659                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 12660 0000135F 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 12661                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 12662                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 12663 00001364 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 12664 00001368 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 12665                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 12666 0000136C BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 12667 0000136F 1E                      		push	ds
 12668 00001370 07                      		pop	es
 12669                                  win_iret:				
 12670 00001371 1F                      		pop	ds
 12671                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 12672 00001372 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 12673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12674                                  
 12675                                  handle_multmult:			
 12676 00001374 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 12677 00001376 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 12678 00001378 1E                      		push	ds
 12679 00001379 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 12680                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12681                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 12682                                  		;dec	bx
 12683 0000137C BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 12684 0000137F 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 12685 00001381 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 12686 00001383 F7D3                    		not	bx
 12687 00001385 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 12688 00001387 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 12689 00001389 43                      		inc	bx
 12690                                  try_1:					
 12691 0000138A 1F                      		pop	ds
 12692 0000138B EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 12693                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12694                                  
 12695                                  try_2:					
 12696 0000138D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 12697 0000138F 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 12698 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 12699                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12700                                  		;xor	di, di
 12701                                  		;dec	di
 12702 00001392 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 12703 00001395 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 12704 00001397 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 12705 0000139A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 12706 0000139D 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 12707 0000139F F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 12708 000013A1 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 12709 000013A3 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 12710                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12711                                  		;sub	di, di
 12712                                  		;dec	di
 12713 000013A5 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 12714 000013A8 EB16                    		jmp	short InsuffHMA
 12715                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12716                                  
 12717                                  try_4:					
 12718                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 12719 000013AA 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 12720 000013AE 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 12721                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 12722                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12723 000013B1 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 12724                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 12725 000013B4 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 12726 000013B8 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 12727 000013BA C706[F508]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 12728                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 12729                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 12730                                  InsuffHMA:				
 12731 000013C0 1F                      		pop	ds
 12732                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12733                                  try_3:		
 12734 000013C1 EBAF                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 12735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12736                                  
 12737                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12738                                  ;try_3:					
 12739                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
 12740                                  
 12741                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12742                                  
 12743                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12744                                  
 12745                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12746                                  ;
 12747                                  ; procedure : HMAPtr
 12748                                  ;
 12749                                  ;		Gets the offset of the free HMA area ( with respect to
 12750                                  ;							seg ffff )
 12751                                  ;		If DOS has not moved high, tries to move DOS high.
 12752                                  ;		In the course of doing this, it will allocate all the HMA
 12753                                  ;		and set the FreeHMAPtr to past the end of the BIOS and 
 12754                                  ;		DOS code. The call to MoveDOSIntoHMA (which is a pointer)
 12755                                  ;		enters the routine in sysinit1 called FTryToMovDOSHi.
 12756                                  ;
 12757                                  ;	RETURNS : offset of free HMA in DI
 12758                                  ;		  BIOS_DATA, seg in DS
 12759                                  ;
 12760                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12761                                  
 12762                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12763                                  HMAPtr:
 12764 000013C3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12765                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12766 000013C8 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 12767                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 12768 000013CC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 12769 000013CF 750F                    		jnz	short HMAPtr_retn
 12770 000013D1 803E[FB08]00            		cmp	byte [SysinitPresent], 0
 12771                                  		;cmp	ds:SysinitPresent, 0
 12772 000013D6 7408                    		jz	short HMAPtr_retn
 12773 000013D8 FF1E[F708]              		call	far [MoveDOSIntoHMA]
 12774                                  		;call	ds:MoveDOSIntoHMA ; call far [MoveDOSIntoHMA]
 12775 000013DC 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 12776                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 12777                                  HMAPtr_retn:				
 12778 000013E0 C3                      		retn
 12779                                  
 12780                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12781                                  
 12782                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12783                                  
 12784                                  ; move a 512 byte sector from ds:si to es:di, do not trash cx
 12785                                  ; but go ahead and update direction flag, si, & di
 12786                                  
 12787                                  move_sector:
 12788                                  
 12789                                  ; The 80386 microprocessor considers an access to WORD 0FFFFh in
 12790                                  ; any segment to be a fault. Theoretically, this could be handled
 12791                                  ; by the fault handler and the behavior of an 8086 could be emulated
 12792                                  ; by wrapping the high byte to offset 0000h. This would be a lot
 12793                                  ; of work and was, indeed, blown off by the Win386 guys. COMPAQ
 12794                                  ; also handles the fault incorrectly in their ROM BIOS for real
 12795                                  ; mode. Their fault handler was only designed to deal with one
 12796                                  ; special case which occurred in a magazine benchmark, but didn't
 12797                                  ; handle the general case worth beans.
 12798                                  ;
 12799                                  ; Simply changing this code to do a byte loop would work okay but
 12800                                  ; would involve a general case performance hit. Therefore, we'll
 12801                                  ; check for either source or destination offsets being within one
 12802                                  ; sector of the end of their segments and only in that case fall
 12803                                  ; back to a byte move.
 12804                                  
 12805 000013E1 FC                      		cld
 12806 000013E2 51                      		push	cx
 12807 000013E3 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256
 12808 000013E6 81FE00FE                		cmp	si, 0FE00h
 12809 000013EA 770A                    		ja	short movsec_bytes
 12810 000013EC 81FF00FE                		cmp	di, 0FE00h
 12811 000013F0 7704                    		ja	short movsec_bytes
 12812 000013F2 F3A5                    		rep movsw
 12813 000013F4 59                      		pop	cx
 12814 000013F5 C3                      		retn
 12815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12816                                  
 12817                                  movsec_bytes:				
 12818 000013F6 D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1
 12819 000013F8 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12820 000013FA 59                      		pop	cx
 12821 000013FB C3                      		retn
 12822                                  
 12823                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12824                                  
 12825                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12826                                  
 12827                                  ; check_wrap is a routine that adjusts the starting sector, starting head
 12828                                  ; and starting cylinder for an int 13 request that requests i/o of a lot
 12829                                  ; of sectors. it only does this for fixed disks. it is used in the sections
 12830                                  ; of code that handle ecc errors and dma errors. it is necessary, because
 12831                                  ; ordinarily the rom would take care of wraps around heads and cylinders,
 12832                                  ; but we break down a request when we get an ecc or dma error into several
 12833                                  ; i/o of one or more sectors. in this case, we may already be beyond the
 12834                                  ; number of sectors on a track on the medium, and the request would fail.
 12835                                  ;
 12836                                  ; input conditions:
 12837                                  ;	all registers set up for an int 13 request.
 12838                                  ;
 12839                                  ; output:
 12840                                  ;	dh - contains starting head number for request
 12841                                  ;	cx - contains starting sector and cylinder numbers
 12842                                  ;	(the above may or may not have been changed, and are 0-based)
 12843                                  ;	all other registers preserved.
 12844                                  
 12845                                  check_wrap:	
 12846 000013FC 50                      		push	ax
 12847 000013FD 53                      		push	bx
 12848 000013FE 06                      		push	es
 12849 000013FF 57                      		push	di
 12850 00001400 E86E00                  		call	find_bds	; get pointer to bds for drive in dl
 12851 00001403 7260                    		jb	short no_wrap	; finished if DOS doesn't use it
 12852                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12853 00001405 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12854                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 12855 0000140A 7459                    		jz	short no_wrap	; no wrapping for removable media
 12856 0000140C 268B5D13                		mov	bx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12857 00001410 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12858 00001412 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh		; extract sector number
 12859 00001415 39D8                    		cmp	ax, bx		; are we going to wrap?
 12860 00001417 764C                    		jbe	short no_wrap
 12861 00001419 F6F3                    		div	bl		; ah=new sector	#, al=#	of head	wraps
 12862                                  
 12863                                  ; we need to be careful here. if the new sector # is 0, then we are on the
 12864                                  ; last sector on that track.
 12865                                  
 12866 0000141B 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12867 0000141D 7503                    		jnz	short not_on_bound
 12868                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12869 0000141F 48                      		dec	ax ; *
 12870 00001420 88DC                    		mov	ah, bl		; set sector=BDS_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK
 12871                                  					; if on	boundary
 12872                                  		;dec	al ; *		; also decrement # of head wraps
 12873                                  not_on_bound:				
 12874 00001422 80E1C0                  		and	cl, 0C0h	; zero out sector #
 12875 00001425 08E1                    		or	cl, ah		; or in	new sector #
 12876 00001427 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; ax = # of head wraps
 12877 00001429 40                      		inc	ax
 12878 0000142A 00F0                    		add	al, dh		; add in starting head #
 12879 0000142C 80D400                  		adc	ah, 0		; catch	any carry
 12880 0000142F 263B4515                		cmp	ax, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12881                                  					; are we going to wrap around a	head?
 12882 00001433 7636                    		jbe	short no_wrap_head ; do	not lose new head number!!
 12883 00001435 52                      		push	dx		; preserve drive number and head number
 12884 00001436 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12885 00001438 268B5D15                		mov	bx, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12886 0000143C F7F3                    		div	bx		; dx=new head #, ax=# of cylinder wraps
 12887                                  
 12888                                  ; careful here! if new head # is 0, then we are on the last head.
 12889                                  
 12890 0000143E 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
 12891 00001440 7507                    		jnz	short no_head_bound
 12892 00001442 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		; on boundary. set to BDS_BPB.BPB_HEADS
 12893                                  
 12894                                  ; if we had some cylinder wraps, we need to reduce them by one!!
 12895                                  
 12896 00001444 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 12897 00001446 7401                    		jz	short no_head_bound
 12898 00001448 48                      		dec	ax		; reduce number	of cylinder wraps
 12899                                  no_head_bound:				
 12900 00001449 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; bh has new head number
 12901 0000144B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore drive number and head number
 12902 0000144C FECF                    		dec	bh		; get it 0-based
 12903 0000144E 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; set up new head number in dh
 12904 00001450 88CF                    		mov	bh, cl
 12905 00001452 80E73F                  		and	bh, 3Fh		; preserve sector number
 12906 00001455 B306                    		mov	bl, 6
 12907 00001457 86CB                    		xchg	cl, bl
 12908 00001459 D2EB                    		shr	bl, cl		; get ms cylinder bits to ls end
 12909 0000145B 00C5                    		add	ch, al		; add in cylinder wrap
 12910 0000145D 10E3                    		adc	bl, ah		; add in high byte
 12911 0000145F D2E3                    		shl	bl, cl		; move up to ms	end
 12912 00001461 86D9                    		xchg	bl, cl		; restore cylinder bits	into cl
 12913 00001463 08F9                    		or	cl, bh		; or in	sector number
 12914                                  no_wrap:				
 12915 00001465 F8                      		clc
 12916 00001466 5F                      		pop	di
 12917 00001467 07                      		pop	es
 12918 00001468 5B                      		pop	bx
 12919 00001469 58                      		pop	ax
 12920 0000146A C3                      		retn
 12921                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12922                                  
 12923                                  no_wrap_head:				
 12924 0000146B 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; do not lose new head number
 12925 0000146D FECE                    		dec	dh		; get it 0-based
 12926 0000146F EBF4                    		jmp	short no_wrap
 12927                                  
 12928                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12929                                  
 12930                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12931                                  
 12932                                  ; this is a special version of the bds lookup code which is
 12933                                  ; based on physical drives rather than the usual logical drives
 12934                                  ; carry is set if the physical drive in dl is found, es:di -> its bds
 12935                                  ; otherwise carry is clear
 12936                                  ;
 12937                                  ; guaranteed to trash no registers except es:di
 12938                                  
 12939                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12940                                  find_bds:	
 12941 00001471 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]	; point es:di to first bds
 12942                                  fbds_1:					
 12943 00001475 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12944 00001479 7409                    		jz	short fdbs_2
 12945 0000147B 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12946                                  					; go to next bds
 12947 0000147E 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 12948 00001481 75F2                    		jnz	short fbds_1
 12949 00001483 F9                      		stc
 12950                                  fdbs_2:					
 12951 00001484 C3                      		retn
 12952                                  
 12953                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12954                                  
 12955                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12956                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12957                                  doint:
 12958                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12959 00001485 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 12960                                  					; get physical drive number
 12961                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary !
 12962                                  		;db	8Ah, 96h, 8, 0	; mov dl, [bp+8]	
 12963                                  		
 12964 00001488 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12965 0000148A 08C0                    		or	al, al
 12966 0000148C 7410                    		jz	short dointdone	; if zero sectors, return ax=0
 12967                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12968 0000148E 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 12969                                  					; get request code
 12970                                  		;db	8Ah, 0A6h, 3, 0	; mov ah, [bp+3]
 12971 00001491 FF7610                  		push	word [bp+10h]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldf]
 12972                                  		;db	0FFh, 0B6h, 10h, 0 ; push word [bp+10h]
 12973 00001494 9D                      		popf
 12974                                  		;call	far 70h:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:14EAh
 12975                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12976 00001495 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 12977                                  		;;call	call_orig13	; call far 70h:797h
 12978                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 12979 0000149A 9C                      		pushf
 12980                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12981 0000149B 8F4610                  		pop	word [bp+10h]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldf]
 12982                                  		;db	8Fh, 86h, 10h, 0 ; pop word [bp+10h]
 12983                                  dointdone:				
 12984 0000149E C3                      		retn
 12985                                  
 12986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12987                                  
 12988                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12989                                  
 12990                                  ; this is the true int 13 handler. we parse the request to see if there is
 12991                                  ; a dma violation. if so, depending on the function, we:
 12992                                  ;   read/write break the request into three pieces and move the middle one
 12993                                  ;	       into our internal buffer.
 12994                                  ;
 12995                                  ;   format     copy the format table into the buffer
 12996                                  ;   verify     point the transfer address into the buffer
 12997                                  ;
 12998                                  ; this is the biggest bogosity of all. the ibm controller does not handle
 12999                                  ; operations that cross physical 64k boundaries. in these cases, we copy
 13000                                  ; the offending sector into the buffer below and do the i/o from there.
 13001                                  
 13002                                  ;struc INT13FRAME
 13003                                  ;.oldbp: resw
 13004                                  ;.oldax: resw 
 13005                                  ;.oldbx: resw
 13006                                  ;.oldcx: resw
 13007                                  ;.olddx: resw
 13008                                  ;.oldds: resw	; now we save caller's ds, too
 13009                                  ;.olddd: resd
 13010                                  ;.oldf:	resw
 13011                                  ;end struc
 13012                                  
 13013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13014                                  
 13015                                  ;   entry conditions:
 13016                                  ;	ah = function
 13017                                  ;	al = number of sectors
 13018                                  ;	es:bx = dma address
 13019                                  ;	cx = packed track and sector
 13020                                  ;	dx = head and drive
 13021                                  ;   output conditions:
 13022                                  ;	no dma violation.
 13023                                  
 13024                                  ;	use extreme caution when working with this code. In general,
 13025                                  ;	  all registers are hot at all times.
 13026                                  ;
 13027                                  ;	question:  does this code handle cases where dma errors
 13028                                  ;	  occur during ecc retries, and where ecc errors occur during
 13029                                  ;	  dma breakdowns???? Hmmmmm.
 13030                                  
 13031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13032                                  
 13033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13034                                  
 13035 0000149F 90004000                dtype_array:	dd 400090h		; 40:90	is drive type array
 13036                                  
 13037                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13038                                  ;DTYPEARRAY equ dtype_array - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (14F5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13039                                  ; 09/12/2022
 13040                                  DTYPEARRAY equ dtype_array
 13041                                  
 13042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13043                                  
 13044                                  ; stick some special stuff out of mainline
 13045                                  
 13046                                  ; we know we're doing a format command. if we have changeline
 13047                                  ; support, then flag some special changed stuff and set changed
 13048                                  ; by format bit for all logical drives using this physical drive
 13049                                  
 13050                                  format_special_stuff:			
 13051 000014A3 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we have changeline support?
 13052 000014A8 7459                    		jz	short format_special_stuff_done ; brif not
 13053 000014AA 53                      		push	bx
 13054 000014AB BB4001                  		mov	bx, 140h	; fchanged_by_format+fchanged
 13055 000014AE E83804                  		call	set_changed_dl	; indicate that media changed by format
 13056 000014B1 5B                      		pop	bx
 13057 000014B2 EB4F                    		jmp	short format_special_stuff_done
 13058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13059                                  
 13060                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13061                                  
 13062                                  ; we know we've got ec35's on the system. Now see if we're doing
 13063                                  ; a floppy. If so, create a mask and see if this particular
 13064                                  ; drive is an ec35. If so, set dtype_array[drive]=93h
 13065                                  
 13066                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13067                                  ec35_special_stuff:			
 13068 000014B4 84D2                    		test	dl, dl		; floppy or hard disk?
 13069 000014B6 7852                    		js	short ec35_special_stuff_done ;	if hard	drive, we're done
 13070 000014B8 50                      		push	ax		; see if this PARTICULAR drive is ec35
 13071 000014B9 51                      		push	cx
 13072 000014BA 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; turn drive number into bit map
 13073 000014BC B001                    		mov	al, 1		; assume drive 0
 13074 000014BE D2E0                    		shl	al, cl		; shift	over correct number of times
 13075 000014C0 8406[3105]              		test	[ec35flag], al	; electrically compatible 3.5 incher?
 13076 000014C4 59                      		pop	cx
 13077 000014C5 58                      		pop	ax
 13078 000014C6 7442                    		jz	short ec35_special_stuff_done
 13079                                  					; done if this floppy is not an	ec35
 13080 000014C8 53                      		push	bx		; free up a far	pointer	(es:bx)
 13081 000014C9 06                      		push	es
