 13082                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13083 000014CA 2EC41E[9F14]            		les	bx, [cs:DTYPEARRAY]
 13084                                  		;les	bx, dword ptr cs:DTYPEARRAY ; [cs:dtype_array]
 13085                                  					; 0070h:3A65h =	2C7h:14F5h
 13086 000014CF 00D3                    		add	bl, dl
 13087 000014D1 80D700                  		adc	bh, 0		; find entry for this drive
 13088 000014D4 26C60793                		mov	byte [es:bx], 93h ; establish drive type as:
 13089                                  					; (360k	disk in	360k drive,
 13090                                  					; no double-stepping, 250 kbs transfer rate)
 13091 000014D8 07                      		pop	es
 13092 000014D9 5B                      		pop	bx
 13093 000014DA EB2E                    		jmp	short ec35_special_stuff_done
 13094                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13095                                  
 13096                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13097                                  
 13098                                  ; ps2_30 machine has some problem with ah=8h (read drive parm), int 13h.
 13099                                  ; this function does not reset the common buses after the execution.
 13100                                  ; to solve this problem, when we detect ah=8h, then we will save the result and
 13101                                  ; will issue ah=1 (read status) call to reset the buses.
 13102                                  
 13103                                  ps2_special_stuff:			
 13104 000014DC 803E[1E00]08            		cmp	byte [prevoper], 8 ; (ps2_30)
 13105                                  					; read driver parm ?
 13106 000014E1 7407                    		jz	short ps2_30_problem
 13107 000014E3 803E[1E00]15            		cmp	byte [prevoper], 15h
 13108                                  					; apparently function 15h fails, too
 13109 000014E8 752D                    		jnz	short ps2_special_stuff_done
 13110                                  ps2_30_problem:				
 13111 000014EA 50                      		push	ax
 13112 000014EB B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 13113                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1543h
 13114                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13115 000014ED 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13116                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far 70:797h
 13117                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13118 000014F2 58                      		pop	ax
 13119 000014F3 EB22                    		jmp	short ps2_special_stuff_done
 13120                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13121                                  
 13122                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13123                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13124                                  
 13125                                  ; here is the actual int13 handler
 13126                                  
 13127                                  i13z:					; 0070h:3ABBh =	02C7h:154Bh
 13128                                  
 13129                                  ; cas -- inefficient! could push ds and load ds-> Bios_Data before
 13130                                  ; vectoring up here from Bios_Data
 13131                                  
 13132                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13133 000014F5 1E                      		push	ds		; save caller's ds register first thing
 13134                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 13135                                  					; and set up our own ds -> Bios_Data
 13136 000014F6 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13137                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13138                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13139                                  
 13140                                  ; let the operation proceed. if there is a dma violation, then we do things
 13141                                  
 13142 000014FB A3[1E00]                		mov	[prevoper], ax	; save request
 13143 000014FE 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 13144 00001501 74A0                    		jz	short format_special_stuff
 13145                                  					; go do special stuff for format
 13146                                   format_special_stuff_done:		
 13147 00001503 803E[3105]00            		cmp	byte [ec35flag], 0 ; any electrically compat 3.5 inchers?
 13148 00001508 75AA                    		jnz	short ec35_special_stuff
 13149                                  					; go handle it out of line if so
 13150                                  ec35_special_stuff_done:
 13151                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1560h		
 13152 0000150A 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13153                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13154                                  		
 13155 0000150F 9C                      		pushf			; save result flags
 13156                                  		
 13157 00001510 803E[3E06]FA            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FAh ; is this a ps2/30?
 13158                                  					; mdl_ps2_30
 13159 00001515 74C5                    		jz	short ps2_special_stuff
 13160                                  					; exit mainline to address special
 13161                                  ps2_special_stuff_done:			; ps2/30 problem if so		
 13162 00001517 9D                      		popf
 13163 00001518 7221                    		jb	short goterr13	; error	on original orig13 call-thru?
 13164                                  ret_from_i13:				
 13165 0000151A 1F                      		pop	ds
 13166 0000151B CA0200                  		retf	2		; restore ds &	iret w/flags
 13167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13168                                  
 13169                                  ; most of our code exits through here. If carry isn't set, then
 13170                                  ; just do a simple exit. Else doublecheck that we aren't getting
 13171                                  ; a changeline error.
 13172                                  
 13173                                  i13ret_ck_chglinerr:			
 13174 0000151E 73FA                    		jnb	short ret_from_i13 ; done if not an error termination
 13175                                  i13_ret_error:				
 13176 00001520 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; did i	see a change event?
 13177 00001523 7513                    		jnz	short int13b	; skip if wrong	error
 13178 00001525 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; is this for the hard disk?
 13179 00001527 780F                    		js	short int13b	; yes, ignore
 13180 00001529 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 13181 0000152E 7408                    		jz	short int13b	; just in case ROM returned this
 13182                                  					; error	even though it told us it
 13183                                  					; never	would
 13184 00001530 53                      		push	bx
 13185 00001531 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13186 00001534 E8B203                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13187 00001537 5B                      		pop	bx
 13188                                  int13b:					
 13189 00001538 F9                      		stc			; now return the error
 13190 00001539 EBDF                    		jmp	short ret_from_i13
 13191                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13192                                  
 13193                                  ; some kind of error occurred. see if it is dma violation
 13194                                  
 13195                                  goterr13:				
 13196 0000153B 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; dma error?
 13197 0000153E 747C                    		jz	short gotdmaerr
 13198                                  goterr13_xxxx:				
 13199 00001540 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; ecc error?
 13200 00001543 75DB                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error ; other error. just	return back.
 13201 00001545 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1 ; formatting?
 13202 0000154A 74D4                    		jz	short i13_ret_error
 13203                                  
 13204 0000154C 803E[1F00]02            		cmp	byte [prevoper+1], 2
 13205                                  		;cmp	byte ptr ds:prevoper+1,	2 ; ecc-corrected error
 13206                                  					; (2 = romread)
 13207                                  					; ECC correction only applies to reads
 13208 00001551 75CD                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error
 13209                                  
 13210 00001553 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 13211                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15ABh
 13212                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13213 00001555 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13214                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13215                                  					; call far 70:797h
 13216 0000155A A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]
 13217 0000155D 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; return code =	no error
 13218 0000155F 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; if request for one sector, assume ok
 13219 00001561 74B7                    		jz	short ret_from_i13 ; return with carry clear
 13220 00001563 53                      		push	bx
 13221 00001564 51                      		push	cx
 13222 00001565 52                      		push	dx
 13223 00001566 A2[2000]                		mov	[number_of_sec], al
 13224                                  loop_ecc:				
 13225 00001569 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 13226                                  
 13227                                  ; we do reads one sector at a time. this ensures that we will eventually
 13228                                  ; finish the request since ecc errors on one sector do read in that sector.
 13229                                  ;
 13230                                  ; we need to put in some "intelligence" into the ecc handler to handle reads
 13231                                  ; that attempt to read more sectors than are available on a particular
 13232                                  ; track.
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; we call check_wrap to set up the sector #, head # and cylinder # for
 13235                                  ; this request.
 13236                                  ;
 13237                                  ; at this point, all registers are set up for the call to orig13, except
 13238                                  ; that there may be a starting sector number that is bigger than the number
 13239                                  ; of sectors on a track.
 13240                                  ;
 13241 0000156C E88DFE                  		call	check_wrap	; get correct parameters for int 13
 13242                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15C5h
 13243                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13244 0000156F 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13245                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13246 00001574 730C                    		jnb	short ok11_op
 13247 00001576 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; DMA error during ECC read?
 13248 00001579 741B                    		jz	short handle_dma_during_ecc
 13249 0000157B 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; only allow ecc errors
 13250 0000157E 7510                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err
 13251                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13252                                  		; xor ax ax -> ah = 0
 13253                                  		;mov	ah, 0		; ecc error. reset the system again.
 13254 00001580 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; clear	the error code so that if this
 13255                                  					; was the last sector, no error	code
 13256                                  					; will be returned for the corrected
 13257                                  					; read.	(clear carry too.)
 13258                                  ok11_op:				
 13259 00001582 FE0E[2000]              		dec	byte [number_of_sec]
 13260 00001586 7409                    		jz	short ok11_exit	; all done?
 13261 00001588 FEC1                    		inc	cl		; advance sector number
 13262                                  					; add 200h to address
 13263 0000158A FEC7                    		inc	bh
 13264 0000158C FEC7                    		inc	bh
 13265 0000158E EBD9                    		jmp	short loop_ecc
 13266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13267                                  
 13268                                  ; locate error returns centrally
 13269                                  
 13270                                  ok11_exit_err:				
 13271 00001590 F9                      		stc			; set carry bit again.
 13272                                  ok11_exit:				
 13273 00001591 5A                      		pop	dx
 13274 00001592 59                      		pop	cx
 13275 00001593 5B                      		pop	bx
 13276 00001594 EB88                    		jmp	short i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 13277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13278                                  
 13279                                  ; do the single sector read again, this time into our temporary
 13280                                  ; buffer, which is guaranteed not to have a DMA error, then
 13281                                  ; move the data to its proper location and proceed
 13282                                  
 13283                                  handle_dma_during_ecc:			
 13284 00001596 06                      		push	es
 13285 00001597 53                      		push	bx
 13286 00001598 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 13287 0000159B 1E                      		push	ds
 13288 0000159C 07                      		pop	es		; point es:bx to buffer
 13289 0000159D B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 13290                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15F8h
 13291                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13292 000015A0 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13293                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13294 000015A5 5B                      		pop	bx
 13295 000015A6 07                      		pop	es
 13296 000015A7 7305                    		jnb	short handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr
 13297 000015A9 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h
 13298 000015AC 75E2                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err ; if anything but ecc error, bomb out
 13299                                  
 13300                                  ; now we're kosher. Copy the data to where it belongs and resume
 13301                                  ; the ECC looping code.
 13302                                  
 13303                                  handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr:		
 13304 000015AE 56                      		push	si
 13305 000015AF 57                      		push	di
 13306 000015B0 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 13307 000015B2 BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 13308 000015B5 E829FE                  		call	move_sector
 13309 000015B8 5F                      		pop	di
 13310 000015B9 5E                      		pop	si
 13311 000015BA EBC6                    		jmp	short ok11_op
 13312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13313                                  
 13314                                  ; we truly have a dma violation. restore register ax and retry the
 13315                                  ; operation as best we can.
 13316                                  
 13317                                  gotdmaerr:				
 13318 000015BC A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]	; 19/10/2022
 13319 000015BF FB                      		sti
 13320 000015C0 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 13321 000015C3 723B                    		jb	short i13_done_dmaerr
 13322                                  					; just pass dma error thru for
 13323                                  					; functions we don't handle
 13324 000015C5 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 13325 000015C8 743C                    		jz	short intverify
 13326 000015CA 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 13327 000015CD 7448                    		jz	short intformat
 13328 000015CF 772F                    		ja	short i13_done_dmaerr
 13329                                  
 13330                                  ; we are doing a read/write call. check for dma problems
 13331                                  
 13332                                  ;	******** set up stack frame here!!! ********
 13333                                  
 13334 000015D1 52                      		push	dx
 13335 000015D2 51                      		push	cx
 13336 000015D3 53                      		push	bx
 13337 000015D4 50                      		push	ax
 13338 000015D5 55                      		push	bp
 13339 000015D6 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 13340 000015D8 8CC2                    		mov	dx, es		; check	for 64k	boundary error
 13341 000015DA D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 13342 000015DC D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 13343 000015DE D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 13344 000015E0 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1		; segment converted to absolute	address
 13345 000015E2 01DA                    		add	dx, bx		; combine with offset
 13346 000015E4 81C2FF01                		add	dx, 511		; simulate a transfer
 13347                                  
 13348                                  ; if carry is set, then we are within 512 bytes of the end of the segment.
 13349                                  ; we skip the first transfer and perform the remaining buffering and transfer
 13350                                  
 13351 000015E8 7303                    		jnb	short no_skip_first
 13352 000015EA E98300                  		jmp	bufferx		; restore dh=head & do buffer
 13353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13354                                  
 13355                                  no_skip_first:				
 13356 000015ED D0EE                    		shr	dh, 1		; dh = number of sectors before	address
 13357 000015EF B480                    		mov	ah, 128		; ah = max number of sectors in	segment
 13358 000015F1 28F4                    		sub	ah, dh
 13359                                  
 13360                                  ; ah is now the number of sectors that we can successfully write in this
 13361                                  ; segment. if this number is above or equal to the requested number, then we
 13362                                  ; continue the operation as normal. otherwise, we break it into pieces.
 13363                                  ;
 13364                                  ; wait a sec. this is goofy. the whole reason we got here in the
 13365                                  ; first place is because we got a dma error. so it's impossible
 13366                                  ; for the whole block to fit, unless the dma error was returned
 13367                                  ; in error.
 13368                                  
 13369 000015F3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; can we fit it	in?
 13370 000015F5 7236                    		jb	short doblock	; no, perform blocking.
 13371                                  
 13372                                  ; yes, the request fits. let it happen.
 13373                                  
 13374 000015F7 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 13375                                  					; set up head number
 13376 000015FA E888FE                  		call	doint
 13377 000015FD E9D900                  		jmp	bad13		; and return from this place
 13378                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13379                                  
 13380                                  i13_done_dmaerr:			
 13381 00001600 B409                    		mov	ah, 9		; pass dma error thru to caller
 13382 00001602 F9                      		stc
 13383 00001603 E914FF                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; return with error,
 13384                                  					; we know it's not a changeline error
 13385                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13386                                  
 13387                                  ; verify the given sectors. place the buffer pointer into our space.
 13388                                  
 13389                                  intverify:				
 13390 00001606 06                      		push	es		; save caller's dma address
 13391 00001607 53                      		push	bx
 13392 00001608 1E                      		push	ds		; es:bx	-> Bios_Data:disksector
 13393 00001609 07                      		pop	es
 13394                                  dosimple:				
 13395 0000160A BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 13396                                  					; do the i/o from Bios_Data:disksector
 13397                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1665h
 13398                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13399 0000160D 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13400                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13401 00001612 5B                      		pop	bx
 13402 00001613 07                      		pop	es
 13403 00001614 E907FF                  		jmp	i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 13404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13405                                  
 13406                                  ; format operation. copy the parameter table into Bios_Data:disksector
 13407                                  
 13408                                  intformat:				
 13409 00001617 06                      		push	es
 13410 00001618 53                      		push	bx
 13411 00001619 56                      		push	si
 13412 0000161A 57                      		push	di
 13413 0000161B 1E                      		push	ds
 13414                                  
 13415                                  ; point ds to the caller's dma buffer, es to Bios_Data
 13416                                  ; in other words, swap (ds, es)
 13417                                  
 13418 0000161C 06                      		push	es
 13419 0000161D 1E                      		push	ds
 13420 0000161E 07                      		pop	es
 13421 0000161F 1F                      		pop	ds
 13422 00001620 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
 13423 00001622 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector
 13424 00001625 E8B9FD                  		call	move_sector	; user's data into Bios_Data:disksector
 13425 00001628 1F                      		pop	ds
 13426 00001629 5F                      		pop	di
 13427 0000162A 5E                      		pop	si		; do the i/o from
 13428 0000162B EBDD                    		jmp	short dosimple	; Bios_Data:disksector
 13429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13430                                  
 13431                                  ; we can't fit the request into the entire block. perform the operation on
 13432                                  ; the first block.
 13433                                  ;
 13434                                  ; doblock is modified to correctly handle multi-sector disk i/o.
 13435                                  ; old doblock had added the number of sectors i/oed (ah in old doblock) after
 13436                                  ; the doint call to cl. observing only the lower 6 bits of cl(=max. 64) can
 13437                                  ; represent a starting sector, if ah was big, then cl would be clobbered.
 13438                                  ; by the way, we still are going to use cl for this purpose since checkwrap
 13439                                  ; routine will use it as an input. to prevent cl from being clobbered, a
 13440                                  ; safe number of sectors should be calculated like "63 - # of sectors/track".
 13441                                  ; doblock will handle the first block of requested sectors within the
 13442                                  ; boundary of this safe value.
 13443                                  
 13444                                  doblock:
 13445                                  
 13446                                  ; try to get the # of sectors/track from bds via rom drive number.
 13447                                  ; for any mini disks installed, here we have to pray that they have the
 13448                                  ; same # of sector/track as the main dos partition disk drive.
 13449                                  				
 13450 0000162D 8B5608                  		mov	dx, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 13451                                  					; get head #, drive #
 13452 00001630 51                      		push	cx
 13453 00001631 06                      		push	es
 13454 00001632 57                      		push	di		; ah - # of sectors before dma boundary
 13455                                  					; al - requested # of sectors for i/o.
 13456 00001633 E83BFE                  		call	find_bds
 13457 00001636 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13458                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13459 0000163A 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13460                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 13461 0000163F 5F                      		pop	di
 13462 00001640 07                      		pop	es
 13463 00001641 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; set al=ah for	floppies
 13464 00001643 7404                    		jz	short doblockflop ; they are track by track operation
 13465 00001645 B43F                    		mov	ah, 63		; ah = 63-secpt	(# safe	sectors??)
 13466 00001647 28CC                    		sub	ah, cl		; al - # of sectors before dma boundary
 13467                                  doblockflop:				
 13468 00001649 59                      		pop	cx
 13469                                  doblockcontinue:			
 13470 0000164A 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; if safe_# >= #_of_sectors_to_go_before dma,
 13471 0000164C 7305                    		jnb	short doblocklast ; then #_of_sectors_to_go as it is for doint.
 13472 0000164E 50                      		push	ax
 13473 0000164F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; otherwise, set al to ah to operate.
 13474 00001651 EB03                    		jmp	short doblockdoint
 13475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13476                                  
 13477                                  doblocklast:				
 13478 00001653 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 13479 00001655 50                      		push	ax
 13480                                  doblockdoint:				; let ah = al =	# of sectors for this shot	
 13481 00001656 E82CFE                  		call	doint
 13482 00001659 727E                    		jb	short bad13	; something happened, bye!
 13483 0000165B 58                      		pop	ax
 13484 0000165C 286602                  		sub	[bp+2],	ah	; sub [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax], ah
 13485                                  					; decrement by the successful operation
 13486 0000165F 00E1                    		add	cl, ah		; advance sector #. safety gauranteed.
 13487 00001661 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; advance dma addres
 13488 00001663 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; twice	for 512	byte sectors
 13489 00001665 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; check	the previous value
 13490 00001667 740A                    		jz	short buffer	; if #_of_sectors_to_go	< safe_#,
 13491                                  					; then we are done already.
 13492 00001669 28E0                    		sub	al, ah		; otherwise,
 13493                                  					; #_sector_to_go = #_of_sector_to_go - safe_#
 13494 0000166B E88EFD                  		call	check_wrap	; get new cx, dh for the next operation.
 13495 0000166E EBDA                    		jmp	short doblockcontinue ;	handles	next sectors left.
 13496                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13497                                  
 13498                                  bufferx:				
 13499 00001670 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 13500                                  					; set up head number
 13501                                  buffer:					
 13502 00001673 53                      		push	bx
 13503 00001674 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 13504 00001677 80FC03                  		cmp	ah, 3		; romwrite
 13505 0000167A 7525                    		jnz	short doread	;
 13506                                  					
 13507                                  ; copy the offending sector into local buffer
 13508                                  
 13509 0000167C 06                      		push	es
 13510 0000167D 1E                      		push	ds
 13511 0000167E 56                      		push	si
 13512 0000167F 57                      		push	di
 13513 00001680 1E                      		push	ds		; exchange segment registers
 13514 00001681 06                      		push	es
 13515 00001682 1F                      		pop	ds
 13516 00001683 07                      		pop	es
 13517 00001684 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; where to move
 13518 00001687 57                      		push	di		; save it
 13519 00001688 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; source
 13520 0000168A E854FD                  		call	move_sector	; move sector into local buffer
 13521 0000168D 5B                      		pop	bx		; new transfer address
 13522                                  					; (es:bx = Bios_Data:diskbuffer)
 13523 0000168E 5F                      		pop	di		; restore caller's di & si
 13524 0000168F 5E                      		pop	si
 13525 00001690 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore Bios_Data
 13526                                  
 13527                                  ; see if we are wrapping around a track or head
 13528                                  
 13529 00001691 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 13530                                  					; get drive number
 13531 00001693 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]
 13532 00001696 E863FD                  		call	check_wrap	; sets up registers if wrap-around
 13533                                  					;
 13534                                  					; ah is	function
 13535                                  					; al is	1 for single sector transfer
 13536                                  					; es:bx	is local transfer addres
 13537                                  					; cx is	track/sector number
 13538                                  					; dx is	head/drive number
 13539                                  					; si,di	unchanged
 13540 00001699 E8E9FD                  		call	doint
 13541 0000169C 07                      		pop	es		; restore caller's dma segment
 13542 0000169D 723A                    		jb	short bad13	; go clean up
 13543 0000169F EB22                    		jmp	short dotail
 13544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13545                                  
 13546                                  ; reading a sector. do int first, then move things around
 13547                                  
 13548                                  doread:					
 13549 000016A1 06                      		push	es
 13550 000016A2 53                      		push	bx
 13551 000016A3 1E                      		push	ds		; es = Bios_Code
 13552 000016A4 07                      		pop	es
 13553 000016A5 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 13554 000016A8 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 13555 000016AA 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 13556                                  					; get drive number
 13557 000016AD E84CFD                  		call	check_wrap	;
 13558                                  					; ah = function
 13559                                  					; al = 1 for single sector
 13560                                  					; es:bx	points to local	buffer
 13561                                  					; cx, dx are track/sector, head/drive
 13562 000016B0 E8D2FD                  		call	doint
 13563 000016B3 5B                      		pop	bx
 13564 000016B4 07                      		pop	es
 13565 000016B5 7222                    		jb	short bad13
 13566 000016B7 56                      		push	si
 13567 000016B8 57                      		push	di
 13568 000016B9 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 13569 000016BB BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 13570 000016BE E820FD                  		call	move_sector
 13571 000016C1 5F                      		pop	di
 13572 000016C2 5E                      		pop	si
 13573                                  
 13574                                  ; note the fact that we've done 1 more sector
 13575                                  
 13576                                  dotail:					
 13577 000016C3 5B                      		pop	bx		; retrieve new dma area
 13578 000016C4 80C702                  		add	bh, 2		; advance over sector
 13579 000016C7 41                      		inc	cx
 13580 000016C8 8A4602                  		mov	al, [bp+2]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax]
 13581 000016CB F8                      		clc
 13582 000016CC FEC8                    		dec	al
 13583 000016CE 7409                    		jz	short bad13	; no more i/o
 13584                                  
 13585                                  ; see if we wrap around a track or head boundary with starting sector
 13586                                  ; we already have the correct head number to pass to check_wrap
 13587                                  
 13588 000016D0 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 13589 000016D3 E826FD                  		call	check_wrap
 13590 000016D6 E8ACFD                  		call	doint
 13591                                  
 13592                                  ; we are done. ax has the final code; we throw away what we got before
 13593                                  
 13594                                  ; M046  -- okay gang. Now we've either terminated our DMA loop,
 13595                                  ;	   or we've finished. If carry is set now, our only
 13596                                  ;	   hope for salvation is that it was a read operation
 13597                                  ;	   and the error code is ECC error. In that case, we'll
 13598                                  ;	   just pop the registers and go do the old ECC thing.
 13599                                  ;	   When the DMA error that got us here in the first
 13600                                  ;	   place occurs, it'll handle it.
 13601                                  
 13602                                  bad13:					
 13603 000016D9 89EC                    		mov	sp, bp
 13604 000016DB 5D                      		pop	bp
 13605 000016DC 5B                      		pop	bx
 13606 000016DD 5B                      		pop	bx
 13607 000016DE 59                      		pop	cx
 13608 000016DF 5A                      		pop	dx
 13609 000016E0 7203                    		jb	short xgoterr13_xxxx ; go handle ECC errors
 13610 000016E2 E935FE                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; non-error exit
 13611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13612                                  
 13613                                  xgoterr13_xxxx:				
 13614 000016E5 E958FE                  		jmp	goterr13_xxxx
 13615                                  
 13616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13617                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13618                                  		;db 	0
 13619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13620                                  
 13621                                  ;Bios_Code ends
 13622                                  
 13623                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13624                                  
 13625                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13626                                  ; MSBIO2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13627                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13628                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13629                                  
 13630                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13631                                  dsk_init:				; 2C7h:1742h = 70h:3CB2h
 13632 000016E8 8A26[7500]              		mov	ah, [drvmax]
 13633 000016EC BF[8706]                		mov	di, dskdrvs
 13634 000016EF 1E                      		push	ds		; pass result in es:di
 13635 000016F0 07                      		pop	es
 13636 000016F1 E9C4EE                  		jmp	SetPtrSav
 13637                                  
 13638                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13639                                  
 13640                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13641                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 13642                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 13643                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 13644                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13645                                  
 13646                                  install_bds:		
 13647 000016F4 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 13648 000016F5 BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 13649                                  
 13650                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 13651                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 13652                                  loop_next_bds:				
 13653 000016F8 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 13654                                  					; fetch	next bds
 13655 000016FA 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13656 000016FE 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 13657                                  					; drive	with new one?
 13658 00001701 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 13659 00001703 B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 13660 00001705 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13661                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 13662 00001709 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 13663 0000170C 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 13664                                  					; we don't own it
 13665 00001711 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 13666                                  					; determine if changeline available
 13667 00001714 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 13668 00001717 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13669                                  next_bds:				
 13670 0000171B 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 13671                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 13672 0000171E 75D8                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 13673 00001720 8C4402                  		mov	word [si+2], es ; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 13674                                  					; install bds
 13675 00001723 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 13676 00001725 26C705FFFF              		mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 13677                                  					; set next pointer to null
 13678 0000172A 1F                      		pop	ds
 13679                                  
 13680                                  ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 6.0 Code)
 13681                                  ;
 13682                                  ; **** If the new drive has a higher EOT value, we must alter the
 13683                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.
 13684                                  ;
 13685                                  ;		; 01/06/2019
 13686                                  ;		;mov	al,[es:di+52]

 13688                                  ;

 13690                                  ;		jbe	short _eot_ok
 13691                                  ;		mov	[eot],al
 13692                                  
 13693 0000172B C3                      		retn

 13727                                  					; get the drive	letter

 13730                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa

 13735 00001745 B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 13736                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk

 13740 0000174B 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 13741

 13743

 13745                                  		; 17/10/2022

 13757                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 13758                                  wrmsg_loop:

 13760                                  					; AL = character to display
