 13777                                  
 13778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13779                                  
 13780                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13781                                  
 13782                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 13783                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 13784                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 13785                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 13786                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 13787                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13788                                  
 13789                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 13790 0000176E 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 13791 00001770 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 13791 00001779 736B6574746520666F-
 13791 00001782 7220647269766520   
 13792                                  
 13793                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 13794 0000178A 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 13794 00001793 65737320616E79206B-
 13794 0000179C 6579207768656E2072-
 13794 000017A5 656164790D0A       
 13795 000017AB 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 13796                                  
 13797                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13798                                  
 13799                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13800                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 13801                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 13802                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 13803                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13804                                  
 13805                                  chkopcnt:		
 13806 000017AD 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 13807 000017B2 C3                      		retn
 13808                                  
 13809                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13810                                  
 13811                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13812                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 13813                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 13814                                  ;
 13815                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 13816                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13817                                  
 13818                                  mediacheck:	
 13819 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 13820 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13821 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 13822 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 13823 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 13824 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 13825 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 13826 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 13827 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13828                                  					; set logical drive number
 13829 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13830 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13831                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13832                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13833 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 13834 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 13835 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 13836 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 13837                                  
 13838                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 13839                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 13840                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 13841                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 13842                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 13843                                  ; status.
 13844                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13845 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 13846 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13847                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 13848                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 13849                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 13850                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 13851 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 13852                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 13853                                  
 13854                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 13855                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 13856                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 13857                                  
 13858 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 13859 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 13860 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 13861 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 13862 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 13863 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 13864 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 13865 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 13866 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 13867                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 13868 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 13869                                  mediaret:				
 13870 000017EC C3                      		retn
 13871                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13872                                  
 13873                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 13874                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 13875                                  ; or write.
 13876                                  
 13877                                  mediadovolid:				
 13878 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 13879 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 13880 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 13881 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 13882 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 13883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13884                                  
 13885                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 13886                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 13887                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 13888                                  ; dos.
 13889                                  ;
 13890                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 13891                                  
 13892                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 13893                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 13894                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 13895                                  
 13896                                  checklatchio:	
 13897                                  
 13898                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 13899                                  			
 13900 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 13901 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 13902                                  
 13903                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 13904                                  
 13905 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 13906 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 13907                                  
 13908                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 13909                                  ; expensive verification.
 13910                                  
 13911 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 13912 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 13913 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 13914 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 13915 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 13916 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 13917 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 13918                                  checklatchret:				
 13919 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 13920                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 13921 00001818 F9                      		stc
 13922 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 13923                                  checkret:				
 13924 0000181A C3                      		retn
 13925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13926                                  
 13927                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 13928                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 13929                                  ;
 13930                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 13931                                  
 13932                                  checkfatvid:				
 13933 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 13934 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 13935 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 13936                                  
 13937                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 13938                                  
 13939                                  		; fall into check_vid
 13940                                  
 13941                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13942                                  
 13943                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 13944                                  ;
 13945                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 13946                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 13947                                  ;
 13948                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 13949                                  ;
 13950                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 13951                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 13952                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 13953                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 13954                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 13955                                  ;
 13956                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 13957                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 13958                                  ; routine.)
 13959                                  ;
 13960                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 13961                                  
 13962                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13963                                  check_vid:
 13964                                  
 13965                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 13966                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 13967                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 13968                                  
 13969 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 13970                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 13971                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13972 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 13973 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 13974 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 13975 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13976 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 13977                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 13978 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 13979                                  					; if not fat system
 13980 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 13981 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 13982 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 13983 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 13984                                  					; definitely changed
 13985 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 13986                                  
 13987 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 13988                                  vid_no_changed:				
 13989 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 13990                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13991                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 13992                                  		;clc
 13993                                  checkfatret:				
 13994 00001848 C3                      		retn
 13995                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13996                                  
 13997                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13998                                  changed_drv:
 13999 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14000 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14001                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14002 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14004                                  
 14005                                  ; extended id check
 14006                                  
 14007                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14008                                  
 14009                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14010                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14011                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14012                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14013                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14014                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14015                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14016                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14017                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14018                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14019                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14020                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14021                                  ;
 14022                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14023                                  
 14024                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14025                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14026 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14027                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14028                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14029 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14030 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14031 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14032 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14033 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14034 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14035 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14036                                  					; don't know
 14037 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14038 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14039                                  					; reset the flag
 14040                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14041                                  
 14042                                  ext_changed:				
 14043 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14044 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14045                                  					; disk changed!
 14046                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14047                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14048                                  		;clc
 14049 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14050                                  
 14051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14052                                  
 14053                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14054                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14055                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14056                                  ;
 14057                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14058                                  
 14059                                  checkio:				
 14060 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14061 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14062 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14063 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14064 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14065 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14066 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14067 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14068 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14069 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14070 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14071 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14073                                  
 14074                                  checkioerr:				
 14075 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14076                                  
 14077                                  checkioret:				
 14078 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14079 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14081                                  
 14082                                  no_error_map:				
 14083 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14084                                  
 14085                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14086                                  
 14087                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14088                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14089                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14090                                  
 14091                                  returnvid:		
 14092 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14093                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14094 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14095 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14096 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14097 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14098                                  
 14099                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14100                                  
 14101                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14102                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14103                                  ;
 14104                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14105                                  ; **trashes si**
 14106                                  
 14107                                  media_set_vid:				
 14108 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14109                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14110                                  
 14111                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14112                                  
 14113                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14114                                  
 14115                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14116                                  
 14117                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14118                                  vid_into_packet:
 14119 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14120 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14121 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14122 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14123 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14124 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14125 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14126                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14127 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14128                                  
 14129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14130                                  
 14131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14132                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14133                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14134                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14135                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14136                                  ;
 14137                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14138                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14139                                  ;
 14140                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14141                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14142                                  ;		carry set
 14143                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14144                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14145                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14146                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14147                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14148                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14149                                  ;
 14150                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14151                                  
 14152                                  hidensity:
 14153                                  
 14154                                  ; check for correct drive
 14155                                  		
 14156                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14157 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14158                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14159                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14160 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14161                                  
 14162                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14163                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14164                                  
 14165 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14166 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14167                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14168                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14169 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14170 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14171                                  
 14172                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14173                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14174                                  
 14175 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14176                                  					; ffOther
 14177 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14178 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14179                                  					; ff288
 14180 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14181 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14182 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14183                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14184                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14185 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14186                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14187                                  					; 2 sides
 14188 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14189                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14190                                  					; & head max
 14191 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14192 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14194                                  
 14195                                  Is720K:					
 14196 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14197 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14199                                  
 14200                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14201                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14202                                  		;retn
 14203                                  
 14204                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14205                                  
 14206                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14207                                  
 14208                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14209                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14210                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14211                                  ;
 14212                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14213                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14214                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14215                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14216                                  ;
 14217                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14218                                  ;
 14219                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14220                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14221                                  
 14222                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14223 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14224 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14225                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14226                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14227 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14228                                  
 14229                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14230                                  
 14231                                  scan_bds:				
 14232 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14233 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14234                                  
 14235                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14236                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14237                                  
 14238 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14239                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14240                                  get_next_bds:				
 14241 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14242                                  					; go to	next bds
 14243 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14244 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14245 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14246 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14247 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14248                                  
 14249                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14250                                  
 14251                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14252                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14253                                  ;
 14254                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14255                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14256                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14257                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14258                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14259                                  
 14260                                  checkromchange:	
 14261                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14262                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14263 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14264                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14265                                  					; fchanged
 14266 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14267                                  
 14268                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14269                                  
 14270                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14271                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14272                                  ;
 14273                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14274                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14275                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14276                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14277                                  
 14278                                  resetchanged:	
 14279                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14280                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14281 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14282                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14283                                  					; ~fchanged
 14284 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14285                                  
 14286                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14287                                  
 14288                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14289                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14290                                  ;
 14291                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14292                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14293                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14294                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14295                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14296                                  
 14297                                  haschange:
 14298                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14299                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14300 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14301                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14302                                  					; fchangeline
 14303 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14304                                  
 14305                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14306                                  
 14307                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14308                                  
 14309                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14310                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14311                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14312                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14313                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14314                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14315                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14316                                  
 14317                                  ; set_volume_id
 14318                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14319                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14320                                  ;
 14321                                  ;   on entry:
 14322                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14323                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14324                                  ;
 14325                                  ;   on exit:
 14326                                  ;	carry clear:
 14327                                  ;	   successful call
 14328                                  ;	carry set
 14329                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14330                                  
 14331                                  set_volume_id:				
 14332 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14333 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14334 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14335 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14336 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14337 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14338 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14339 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14340                                  setvret:				
 14341                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14342                                  		; cf = 0
 14343                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14344 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14345 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14346 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14347                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14348                                  
 14349                                  seterr:					
 14350 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14351 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14352 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14354 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14355                                  
 14356                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14357                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14358                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14359                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14360                                  
 14361                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14362                                  
 14363                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14364                                  
 14365                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14366                                  ;
 14367                                  ;   on entry:
 14368                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14369                                  ;
 14370                                  ;   on exit:
 14371                                  ;	carry clear
 14372                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14373                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14374                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14375                                  ;
 14376                                  ;	carry set:
 14377                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14378                                  
 14379                                  read_volume_id:
 14380 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14381 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14382 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14383 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14384 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14385 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14386 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14387 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14388 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14389 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14390 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14391 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14392 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14393 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14394 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14395                                  					; # of fats
 14396 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14397                                  					; sectors / fat
 14398 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14399 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14400                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14401                                  					;
 14402                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14403                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14404 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14405                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14406                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14407 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14408                                  					; # root dir entries
 14409 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14410 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14411 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14412                                  next_sec:				
 14413 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14414 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14415                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14416                                  					; get sector #
 14417 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14418                                  					; sectors / track
 14419 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14420 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14421                                  
 14422                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14423                                  
 14424 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14425                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14426 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14427 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14428 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14429                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14430 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14431 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14432 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14433                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14434 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14435 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14436 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14437                                  fvid_loop:				
 14438 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14439 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14440 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14441 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14442 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14443 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14444                                  ent_loop:				
 14445 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14446 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14447 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14448 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14449                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14450                                  					; next sector
 14451 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14452                                  notfound:				
 14453 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14454 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14456                                  
 14457                                  found_vid:				
 14458 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14459 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14460 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14461 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14462 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14463 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14464 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14465 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14466                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14467 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14468 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14469 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14470 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14471 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14472 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14473                                  fvid_ret:				
 14474 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14475                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14476                                  		; cf = 0
 14477                                  		;clc
 14478                                  rvidret:				
 14479 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14480 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14481 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14482 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14484                                  
 14485                                  no_vid:					
 14486 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14487 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14489                                  
 14490                                  readviderr:				
 14491 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14492 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14493 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14494                                  
 14495                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14496                                  
 14497                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14498                                  ;
 14499                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14500                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14501                                  
 14502                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14503 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14504 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14505 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14506 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14507                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14508 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14509                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14510 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14511 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14512 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14513 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14514 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14515 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14516 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14517                                  
 14518                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14519                                  
 14520                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14521                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14522                                  ;
 14523                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14524                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14525                                  
 14526                                  check_volume_id:	
 14527 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14528 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14529 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14530                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14531 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14532                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14533 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14534 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14535 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14536 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14537 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14538 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14539                                  
 14540                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14541                                  
 14542                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14543                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14544                                  ;
 14545                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14546                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14547                                  ;
 14548                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14549                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14550                                  ;
 14551                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14552                                  
 14553                                  fat_check:		
 14554 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14555 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14556 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14557 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14558                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14559 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14560 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14561                                  okret1:					
 14562 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14563 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  
 14567                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14568                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14569                                  
 14570                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14571                                  
 14572                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14573                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14574                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14575                                  
 14576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14577                                  
 14578                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14579                                  		;db 0
 14580                                  
 14581                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14582                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14583                                  
 14584                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14585 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14586                                  %endif
 14587                                  
 14588                                  ;align 16
 14589                                  
 14590                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14591                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14592                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14593                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14594                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14595                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14596

 14644                                  
 14645                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14646                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 14647                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14648                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 14649                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 14650                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 14651                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 14652                                  ;
 14653                                  ;
 14654                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 14655                                  ;
 14656                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 14657                                  ;
 14658                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 14659                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14660                                  ;
 14661                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 14662                                  ;
 14663                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 14664                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14665                                  ;
 14666                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 14667                                  ;
 14668                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 14669                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 14670                                  ;value.
 14671                                  ;
 14672                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 14673                                  ;
 14674                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 14675                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 14676                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 14677                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 14678                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 14679                                  ;
 14680                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 14681                                  ;
 14682                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 14683                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 14684                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 14685                                  ;
 14686                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 14687                                  ;
 14688                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 14689                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 14690                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 14691                                  ;
 14692                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 14693                                  ;
 14694                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 14695                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 14696                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 14697                                  ;
 14698                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 14699                                  ;
 14700                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 14701                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 14702                                  ;
 14703                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 14704                                  ;
 14705                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 14706                                  ;
 14707                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 14708                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 14709                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 14710                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 14711                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 14712                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 14713                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 14714                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 14715                                  ;memory.
 14716                                  ;NOTES:
 14717                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 14718                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 14719                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 14720                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 14721                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 14722                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 14723                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 14724                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 14725                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 14726                                  
 14727                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14728                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 14729                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14730                                  
 14731                                  ;include version.inc
 14732                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14733                                  
 14734                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 14735                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 14736                                  
 14737                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 14738                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 14739                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 14740                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 14741                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 14742                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 14743                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 14744                                  
 14745                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 14746                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14747                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 14748                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 14749                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14750                                  
 14751                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 14752                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14753                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 14754                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 14755                                  
 14756                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 14757                                  
 14758                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 14759                                  				; currently 0.
 14760                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 14761                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 14762                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 14763                                  
 14764                                  ;      if1
 14765                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 14766                                  ;      endif
 14767                                  
 14768                                         ;******************************
 14769                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 14770                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 14771                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 14772                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 14773                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 14774                                         ;******************************
 14775                                  
 14776                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14777                                  ; device definitions
 14778                                  
 14779                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 14780                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 14781                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 14782                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 14783                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 14784                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 14785                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 14786                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 14787                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 14788                                  
 14789                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 14790                                  struc	SYSDEV
 14791 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 14792 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 14793 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 14794 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 14795 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 14796                                  .size:
 14797                                  endstruc
 14798                                  
 14799                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 14800                                  struc	SRHEAD
 14801 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 14802 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 14803 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 14804 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 14805 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 14806                                  .size:
 14807                                  endstruc
 14808                                  
 14809                                  ;Status word masks
 14810                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 14811                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 14812                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 14813                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 14814                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 14815                                  
 14816                                  ;Function codes
 14817                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 14818                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 14819                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 14820                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 14821                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 14822                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 14823                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 14824                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 14825                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 14826                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 14827                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 14828                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 14829                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 14830                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 14831                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 14832                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 14833                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 14834                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 14835                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 14836                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
 14837                                  
 14838                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14839                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 14840 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 14841 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 14842 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 14843 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 14844 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 14845 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 14846                                                          ; word
 14847 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 14848 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 14849 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 14850 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 14851                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 14852                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 14853                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 14854                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 14855                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 14856                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 14857                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 14858                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 14859 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 14860 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 14861 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 14862 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 14863 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 14864 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 14865                                  .size:
 14866                                  endstruc
 14867                                  
 14868                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 14869                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 14870                                  
 14871                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 14872                                  
 14873                                  struc buffinfo
 14874 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 14875 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 14876 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 14877                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 14878                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 14879 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 14880                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 14881                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 14882                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 14883                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 14884                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 14885                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 14886                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 14887                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 14888 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 14889                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 14890 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 14891 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 14892 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 14893 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 14894 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 14895                                  .size:
 14896                                  endstruc
 14897                                  
 14898                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 14899                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 14900                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 14901                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 14902                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 14903                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 14904                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 14905                                  
 14906                                  bufinsiz	equ	buffinfo.size ; ; Size of structure in bytes
 14907                                  
 14908                                  
 14909                                  buf_Free	equ	0FFh		; buf_id of free buffer
 14910                                  
 14911                                  ;Flag byte masks
 14912                                  buf_isnet	EQU	10000000B
 14913                                  buf_dirty	EQU	01000000B
 14914                                  ;***
 14915                                  buf_visit	EQU	00100000B
 14916                                  ;***
 14917                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B
 14918                                  
 14919                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 14920                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 14921                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 14922                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 14923                                  
 14924                                  buf_NetID	EQU	bufinsiz
