 29843                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29844                                  
 29845                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 29846                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 29847                                  ;	retn
 29848                                  
 29849                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29850                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 29851                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29852                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 29853                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 29854                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29855                                  ; USES:     None
 29856                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29857                                  
 29858                                  hideMCB:
 29859                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 29860                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 29861                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 29862                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 29863                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 29864                                  	retn
 29865                                  
 29866                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29867                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 29868                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29869                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 29870                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 29871                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29872                                  ; USES:     None
 29873                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29874                                  
 29875                                  unHideMCB:
 29876                                  	push	ax
 29877                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 29878                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 29879                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 29880                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 29881                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 29882                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 29883                                  	pop	ax
 29884                                  	retn
 29885                                  
 29886                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29887                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 29888                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 29889                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29890                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 29891                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 29892                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 29893                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 29894                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29895                                  
 29896                                  findUMB:
 29897                                  	push	ax
 29898                                  	push	cx
 29899                                  	push	dx
 29900                                  
 29901                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 29902                                  
 29903                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 29904                                  
 29905                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 29906                                  	mov	es,ax
 29907                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 29908                                  
 29909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29910                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 29911                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 29912                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 29913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29914                                  
 29915                                  fu10:	
 29916                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 29917                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 29918                                  
 29919                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 29920                                  	jnz	short fu20
 29921                                  
 29922                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 29923                                  fu20:	
 29924                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29925                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 29926                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29927                                  
 29928                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 29929                                  	mov     ax,es
 29930                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29931                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29932                                  	inc     ax
 29933                                  	mov     es,ax
 29934                                  
 29935                                  	jmp	short fu10
 29936                                  fuE:	
 29937                                  	stc
 29938                                  fuX:
 29939                                  	pop	dx
 29940                                  	pop	cx
 29941                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 29942                                  	retn
 29943                                  
 29944                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29945                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 29946                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29947                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 29948                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 29949                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 29950                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 29951                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29952                                  
 29953                                  BigFree:
 29954                                  	push	bx
 29955                                  	push	cx
 29956                                  
 29957                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 29958                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 29959                                  
 29960                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 29961                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 29962                                  
 29963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29964                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 29965                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 29966                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 29967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29968                                  
 29969                                  bf10:	
 29970                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 29971                                  	jz	short bf30
 29972                                  
 29973                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 29974                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 29975                                  	jnz	short bf20
 29976                                  
 29977                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29978                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 29979                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 29980                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 29981                                  
 29982                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 29983                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 29984                                  	mov	cx,ax
 29985                                  
 29986                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29987                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 29988                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 29989                                  
 29990                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 29991                                  	mov     ax,es
 29992                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29993                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29994                                  	inc     ax
 29995                                  	mov     es,ax
 29996                                  
 29997                                  	jmp	short bf10
 29998                                  
 29999                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30000                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30001                                  	or	bx,bx
 30002                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30003                                  bfE:	
 30004                                  	stc
 30005                                  bfX:
 30006                                  	pop	cx
 30007                                  	pop	bx
 30008                                  	retn
 30009                                  
 30010                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30011                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30012                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30013                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30014                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30015                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30016                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30017                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30018                                  
 30019                                  isSpecified:
 30020                                  	push	ax
 30021                                  
 30022                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30023                                  	mov	bl,al
 30024                                  
 30025                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30026                                  	;
 30027                                  	;push	ds
 30028                                  	;push	cs
 30029                                  	;pop	ds
 30030                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30031                                  	;pop	ds
 30032                                  	
 30033                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30034                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30035                                  
 30036                                  	pop	ax
 30037                                  	retn
 30038                                  
 30039                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30040                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30041                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30042                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30043                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30044                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30045                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30046                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30047                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30048                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30049                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30050                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30051                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30052                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30053                                  
 30054                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30055                                  
 30056                                  shrinkMCB:
 30057                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30058                                  	push	bx
 30059                                  	push	cx
 30060                                  	push	es
 30061                                  
 30062                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30063                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30064                                  
 30065                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30066                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30067                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30068                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30069                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30070                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30071                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30072                                  
 30073                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30074                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30075                                  
 30076                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30077                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30078                                  
 30079                                  	add	ax,bx
 30080                                  	inc	ax
 30081                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30082                                  
 30083                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30084                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30085                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30086                                  	; ax > 0
 30087                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30088                                  
 30089                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30090                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30091                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30092                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30093                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30094                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30095                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30096                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30097                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30098                                  
 30099                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30100                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30101                                  
 30102                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30103                                  	; cf=0
 30104                                  	;clc
 30105                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30106                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30107                                  smE:	
 30108                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30109                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30110                                  	;stc
 30111                                  smX:	
 30112                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30113                                  	pop	es
 30114                                  	pop	cx
 30115                                  	pop	bx
 30116                                  	retn
 30117                                  
 30118                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30119                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30120                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30121                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30122                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30123                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30124                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30125                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30126                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30127                                  ;
 30128                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30129                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30130                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30131                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30132                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30133                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30134                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30135                                  ;       Endif
 30136                                  ;    Endif
 30137                                  ; Endif
 30138                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30139                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30140                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30141                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30142                                  ;    ENDIF
 30143                                  ; ENDIF
 30144                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30145                                  
 30146                                  _hideUMB_:
 30147                                  	push	bx
 30148                                  	push	dx
 30149                                  	push	es
 30150                                  
 30151                                  	mov	al,cl
 30152                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30153                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30154                                  
 30155                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30156                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30157                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30158                                  
 30159                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30160                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30161                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30162                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30163                                  
 30164                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30165                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30166                                  
 30167                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30168                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30169                                  
 30170                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30171                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30172                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30173                                  hu_10:	
 30174                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30175                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30176                                  
 30177                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30178                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30179                                  
 30180                                  	mov	dx,es
 30181                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30182                                  
 30183                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30184                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30185                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30186                                  
 30187                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30188                                  hu_30:	
 30189                                  	mov	al,cl
 30190                                  
 30191                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30192                                  
 30193                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30194                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30195                                  
 30196                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30197                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30198                                  hu_X:	
 30199                                  	pop	es
 30200                                  	pop	dx
 30201                                  	pop	bx
 30202                                  	retn
 30203                                  
 30204                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30205                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30206                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30207                                  ; Entry:  None
 30208                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30209                                  ; Error:  None
 30210                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30211                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30212                                  
 30213                                  UnFreeze:
 30214                                  	push	ax
 30215                                  	push	es
 30216                                  
 30217                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30218                                  	jc	short ufX
 30219                                  
 30220                                  	mov	es,ax
 30221                                  
 30222                                  ; ------------------------------
 30223                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30224                                  ; ------------------------------
 30225                                  
 30226                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30227                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30228                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30229                                  uf20:	
 30230                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30231                                  
 30232                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30233                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30234                                  
 30235                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30236                                  	mov     ax,es
 30237                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30238                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30239                                  	inc     ax
 30240                                  	mov     es,ax
 30241                                  
 30242                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30243                                  ufX:	
 30244                                  	pop	es
 30245                                  	pop	ax
 30246                                  	retn
 30247                                  
 30248                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30249                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30250                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30251                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30252                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30253                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30254                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30255                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30256                                  
 30257                                  isFrozMCB:
 30258                                  	;push	ax
 30259                                  
 30260                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30261                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30262                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30263                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30264                                  
 30265                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30266                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30267                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30268                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30269                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30270                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30271                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30272                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30273                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30274                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30275                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30276                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30277                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30278                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30279                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30280                                  ifmX:	
 30281                                  	;pop	ax
 30282                                  	retn
 30283                                  
 30284                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30285                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30286                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30287                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30288                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30289                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30290                                  ; USES:     None
 30291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30292                                  
 30293                                  frezMCB:
 30294                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30295                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30296                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30297                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30298                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30299                                  	retn
 30300                                  
 30301                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30302                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30303                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30304                                  ; Entry:  None
 30305                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30306                                  ; Error:  None
 30307                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30308                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30309                                  
 30310                                  FreezeUM:
 30311                                  	push	ax
 30312                                  	push	cx
 30313                                  	push	dx
 30314                                  	push	es
 30315                                  
 30316                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30317                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30318                                  
 30319                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30320                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30321                                  
 30322                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30323                                  	mov	es,ax
 30324                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30325                                  
 30326                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30327                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30328                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30329                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30330                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30331                                  
 30332                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30333                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30334                                  
 30335                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30336                                  fum20:	
 30337                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30338                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30339                                  
 30340                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30341                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30342                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30343                                  
 30344                                  	call	frezMCB
 30345                                  fum30:	
 30346                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30347                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30348                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30349                                  
 30350                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30351                                  	mov     ax,es
 30352                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30353                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30354                                  	inc     ax
 30355                                  	mov     es,ax
 30356                                  	
 30357                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30358                                  
 30359                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30360                                  	pop	dx
 30361                                  	pop	cx
 30362                                  	pop	ax
 30363                                  	retn
 30364                                  
 30365                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30366                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30367                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30368                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30369                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30370                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30371                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30372                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30373                                  
 30374                                  UmbTest:
 30375                                  	push	ax
 30376                                  	push	bx
 30377                                  	push	ds
 30378                                  	push	es
 30379                                  
 30380                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30381                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30382                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30383                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30384                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30385                                  
 30386                                  	pop	es
 30387                                  	pop	ds
 30388                                  	pop	bx
 30389                                  	pop	ax
 30390                                  	retn
 30391                                  
 30392                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30393                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30394                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30395                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30396                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30397                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30398                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30399                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30400                                  
 30401                                  WalkMem:
 30402                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30403                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30404                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30405                                  		   	
 30406                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30407                                  	int	21h
 30408                                  
 30409                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30410                                  	mov	es,ax
 30411                                  
 30412                                  ; ------------------------------
 30413                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30414                                  ; ------------------------------
 30415                                  
 30416                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30417                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30418                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30419                                  
 30420                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30421                                  
 30422                                  	mov     bx,es
 30423                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30424                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30425                                  	inc     bx
 30426                                  	mov     es,bx
 30427                                  		
 30428                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30429                                  um20:	
 30430                                  	mov	ax,es
 30431                                  
 30432                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30433                                  
 30434                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30435                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30436                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30437                                  	retn
 30438                                  
 30439                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30440                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30441                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30442                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30443                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30444                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30445                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30446                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30447                                  
 30448                                  hl_unlink:
 30449                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30450                                  
 30451                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30452                                  	;
 30453                                  	;push	ds
 30454                                  	;push	cs
 30455                                  	;pop	ds
 30456                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30457                                  	;pop	ds
 30458                                  
 30459                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30460                                  
 30461                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30462                                  	int	21h
 30463                                  	retn
 30464                                  
 30465                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30466                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30467                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30468                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30469                                  
 30470                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30471                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30472                                  
 30473                                  ;   Modification log:
 30474                                  ;
 30475                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30476                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30477                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30478                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30479                                  
 30480                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30481                                  
 30482                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30483                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30484                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30485                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30486                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30487                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30488                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30489                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30490                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30491                                  
 30492                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30493                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30494                                  
 30495                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30496                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30497                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30498                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30499                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30500                                  ;    every command execution.
 30501                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30502                                  
 30503                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30504                                  	;
 30505                                  	;push	ds
 30506                                  	;push	cs
 30507                                  	;pop	ds
 30508                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30509                                  	;pop	ds	
 30510                                  
 30511                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30512                                  
 30513                                  	or	al,al
 30514                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30515                                  
 30516                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30517                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30518                                  	retn			; that.
 30519                                  uhu10:	
 30520                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30521                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30522                                  
 30523                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30524                                  	;
 30525                                  	;push	es
 30526                                  	;push	cs
 30527                                  	;pop	es
 30528                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30529                                  	;pop	ds	
 30530                                  
 30531                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30532                                  
 30533                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30534                                  
 30535                                  	pop	ax
 30536                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30537                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30538                                  	retn
 30539                                  
 30540                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30541                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30542                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30543                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30544                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30545                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30546                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30547                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30548                                  
 30549                                  he_unlink:
 30550                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30551                                  
 30552                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30553                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30554                                  
 30555                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30556                                  	int	21h
 30557                                  	retn
 30558                                  
 30559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30560                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30561                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30562                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30563                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30564                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30565                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30566                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30567                                  
 30568                                  FreeUMBs:
 30569                                  	push	ax
 30570                                  	push	es
 30571                                  
 30572                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30573                                  	jc	short fusX
 30574                                  
 30575                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30576                                  fus10:	
 30577                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30578                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30579                                  	call	freeMCB
 30580                                  fus20:	   
 30581                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30582                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30583                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30584                                  
 30585                                  	mov	ax,es
 30586                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30587                                  	inc	ax
 30588                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30589                                  
 30590                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30591                                  fusX:	
 30592                                  	pop	es
 30593                                  	pop	ax
 30594                                  	retn
 30595                                  
 30596                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30597                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30598                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30599                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30600                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30601                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30602                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30603                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30604                                  
 30605                                  isHideMCB:
 30606                                  	;push	ax
 30607                                  
 30608                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30609                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30610                                  
 30611                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30612                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30613                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30614                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30615                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30616                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30617                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30618                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30619                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30620                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30621                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30622                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30623                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30624                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30625                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30626                                  ihm_x:	
 30627                                  	;pop	ax
 30628                                  	retn
 30629                                  
 30630                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30631                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30632                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30633                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30634                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30635                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30636                                  ; USES:     AX
 30637                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30638                                  
 30639                                  freeMCB:
 30640                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30641                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30642                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30643                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30644                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30645                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30646                                  	retn
 30647                                  
 30648                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30649                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30651                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30652                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30653                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30654                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30655                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30656                                  
 30657                                  HeadUmb:
 30658                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30659                                  
 30660                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30661                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30662                                  	;push	es
 30663                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30664                                  
 30665                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30666                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30667                                  
 30668                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30669                                  	int	21h
 30670                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30671                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30672                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30673                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30674                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30675                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30676                                  
 30677                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30678                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30679                                  xhu_e:	
 30680                                  	;stc
 30681                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30682                                  xhu_x:	
 30683                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30684                                  	;pop	es	
 30685                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30686                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30687                                  	retn
 30688                                  
 30689                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30690                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30691                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30692                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30693                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30694                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30695                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30696                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30697                                  
 30698                                  linkumb:
 30699                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30700                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30701                                  
 30702                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30703                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30704                                  
 30705                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30706                                  	mov	bx,1
 30707                                  	int	21h
 30708                                  lumbX:
 30709                                  	retn
 30710

 30713                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
