 30716                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30717                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30718                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30719                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30720                                  
 30721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30722                                  ;
 30723                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30724                                  ;
 30725                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30726                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30727                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30728                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30729                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30730                                  ;
 30731                                  ;	Output : none
 30732                                  ;
 30733                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30734                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30735                                  ;
 30736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30737                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30738                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30739                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30740                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30741                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30742                                  
 30743                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30744                                  InitDevLoad:
 30745                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30746                                  	; ds = cs
 30747 000027DC 803E[CB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30748                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30749                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30750 000027E1 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30751                                  
 30752                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30753                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30754                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30755                                  ;
 30756                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30757                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30758                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30759                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30760                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30761                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30762                                  ;
 30763                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30764                                  ;
 30765                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 30766                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 30767                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 30768                                  ;	pushf
 30769                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 30770                                  ;	popf
 30771                                  ;
 30772                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 30773                                  ;
 30774                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 30775                                  
 30776                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30777                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 30778                                  InitForConv:
 30779                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30780                                  	; ds = cs
 30781 000027E3 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 30782                                  					;  current UMB ?
 30783 000027E6 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 30784 000027E8 E84D04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 30785 000027EB E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 30786 000027EE 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 30787                                  					;  in low memory
 30788                                  InitForHi:
 30789                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30790                                  	; ds = cs
 30791                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 30792                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 30793                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 30794 000027F0 A1[C11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 30795 000027F3 8B16[BD1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 30796 000027F7 0316[BF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 30797 000027FB EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 30798                                  
 30799                                  InitForLo:
 30800                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30801                                  	; ds = cs
 30802                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 30803 000027FD C606[CB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30804                                  initforlo_x:
 30805                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30806                                  	; ds = cs
 30807                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 30808                                  					;  we are loading low
 30809                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 30810                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 30811 00002802 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 30812 00002805 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 30813                                  idl1:
 30814 00002809 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 30815                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30816                                  	; ds = cs
 30817                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 30818                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 30819                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 30820                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 30821 0000280C A3[B01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 30822 0000280F 8916[B21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 30823 00002813 C706[B41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 30824 00002819 A3[B61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 30825 0000281C C3                      	retn
 30826                                  
 30827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30828                                  ;
 30829                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 30830                                  ;
 30831                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 30832                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 30833                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 30834                                  ;		   current UMB
 30835                                  ;
 30836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30837                                  
 30838                                  SpaceInUMB:
 30839                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30840                                  	; ds = cs
 30841                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 30842                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 30843                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 30844 0000281D A1[BF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 30845 00002820 0306[BD1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 30846 00002824 2B06[C11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 30847                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30848                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 30849                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 30850                                  	;stc
 30851                                  	;retn
 30852                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30853 00002828 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 30854 0000282B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 30855                                  spcinumb1:
 30856 0000282D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 30857                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30858                                  	; ds = cs
 30859 0000282E 3B06[AE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 30860                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 30861                                  spcinumb2:
 30862 00002832 C3                      	retn
 30863                                  
 30864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30865                                  ;
 30866                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 30867                                  ;
 30868                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 30869                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 30870                                  ;
 30871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30872                                  
 30873                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30874                                  ;
 30875                                  ;PrepareMark:
 30876                                  ;	push	ds
 30877                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 30878                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 30879                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 30880                                  ;	pop	ds
 30881                                  ;
 30882                                  ;	inc	ax
 30883                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30884                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30885                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 30886                                  ;	retn
 30887                                  
 30888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30889                                  ;
 30890                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 30891                                  ;
 30892                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 30893                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 30894                                  ;		 the device.
 30895                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 30896                                  ;
 30897                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 30898                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 30899                                  ;	UMB.
 30900                                  ;
 30901                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 30902                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 30903                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 30904                                  ;
 30905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30906                                  
 30907                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30908                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 30909                                  
 30910                                  GetUMBForDev:
 30911                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30912                                  	; ds = cs
 30913 00002833 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 30914 00002836 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 30915 00002839 CD21                    	int	21h
 30916                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 30917                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 30918                                  
 30919 0000283B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30920 0000283D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 30921                                  
 30922 0000283F 4B                      	dec	bx
 30923                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30924                                  	; ds = cs
 30925 00002840 391E[AE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 30926                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 30927 00002844 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 30928 00002846 43                      	inc	bx
 30929                                  
 30930 00002847 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 30931 0000284A CD21                    	int	21h
 30932 0000284C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 30933                                  
 30934                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30935                                  	;dec	ax
 30936                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 30937                                  	;
 30938                                  PrepareMark:
 30939 0000284E 1E                      	push	ds
 30940 0000284F 48                      	dec	ax
 30941 00002850 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 30942 00002852 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 30943 00002858 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 30944 0000285E 40                      	inc	ax
 30945 0000285F 1F                      	pop	ds
 30946                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30947                                  	; ds = cs
 30948                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 30949                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30950                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30951 00002860 891E[BF1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 30952 00002864 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 30953 00002867 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 30954                                  	;
 30955                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30956                                  	; cf=0
 30957                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 30958 0000286A C3                      	retn
 30959                                  gufd_err:
 30960 0000286B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 30961                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30962                                  	; ds = cs
 30963                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 30964                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30965                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30966 0000286D A3[BF1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 30967 00002870 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 30968 00002873 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 30969 00002876 F9                      	stc
 30970 00002877 C3                      	retn
 30971                                  
 30972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30973                                  ;
 30974                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 30975                                  ;
 30976                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 30977                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 30978                                  ;
 30979                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 30980                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 30981                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 30982                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 30983                                  ;
 30984                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 30985                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 30986                                  ;
 30987                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30988                                  
 30989                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30990                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 30991                                  
 30992                                  DevSetMark:
 30993 00002878 06                      	push	es
 30994 00002879 57                      	push	di
 30995 0000287A 1E                      	push	ds
 30996 0000287B 56                      	push	si
 30997 0000287C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30998 0000287E 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 30999 00002884 40                      	inc	ax
 31000 00002885 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31001                                  
 31002                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31003                                  
 31004 00002889 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31005 0000288A 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31006                                  
 31007 0000288F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31008 00002891 FC                      	cld
 31009                                  dsm_again:
 31010 00002892 AC                      	lodsb
 31011 00002893 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31012 00002895 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31013 00002897 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31014 00002899 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31015                                  isit_slash:
 31016 0000289B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31017 0000289D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31018 0000289F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31019 000028A1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31020                                  isit_null:
 31021 000028A3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31022 000028A5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31023 000028A7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31024                                  
 31025 000028A9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31026 000028AC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31027                                  dsm_next_char:
 31028 000028AF AC                      	lodsb
 31029 000028B0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31030 000028B2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31031 000028B4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31032 000028B6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31033 000028B8 AA                      	stosb
 31034 000028B9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31035                                  blankout:
 31036 000028BB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31037 000028BD B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31038 000028BF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31039                                  dsm_exit:
 31040 000028C1 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31041 000028C2 5E                      	pop	si
 31042 000028C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31043 000028C4 5F                      	pop	di
 31044 000028C5 07                      	pop	es
 31045 000028C6 C3                      	retn
 31046                                  
 31047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31048                                  ;
 31049                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31050                                  ;
 31051                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31052                                  ;
 31053                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31054                                  ;
 31055                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31056                                  ;	in DevSize
 31057                                  ;
 31058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31059                                  
 31060                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31061                                  SizeDevice:
 31062                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31063                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31064 000028C7 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31065 000028C8 06                      	push	es
 31066 000028C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 31067 000028CA 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31068 000028CC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31069 000028CF CD21                    	int	21h
 31070 000028D1 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31071                                  
 31072 000028D3 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31073 000028D5 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31074 000028D8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31075 000028DA 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31076 000028DC CD21                    	int	21h
 31077 000028DE 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31078 000028E0 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31079 000028E3 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31080 000028E6 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31081 000028EA 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31082 000028EC 2EC706[AE1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31083                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31084 000028F3 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31085                                  szdev1:
 31086 000028F5 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31087 000028F7 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31088 000028F9 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31089 000028FB D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31090 000028FD 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31091                                  	;
 31092                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31093 000028FF 2E3B06[CC1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31094                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31095                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31096 00002904 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31097                                  
 31098 00002906 2EA1[CC1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31099                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31100 0000290A F8                      	clc
 31101                                  szdev2:
 31102 0000290B 2EA3[AE1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31103                                  
 31104                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31105                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31106                                  	; cf=0
 31107                                  	;clc
 31108                                  sd_close:
 31109 0000290F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31110                                  					;  carry flag
 31111 00002910 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31112 00002913 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31113 00002915 9D                      	popf
 31114                                  sd_err:
 31115                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31116                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31117 00002916 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31118 00002917 C3                      	retn
 31119                                  
 31120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31121                                  ;
 31122                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 31123                                  ;
 31124                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 31125                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 31126                                  ;
 31127                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 31128                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 31129                                  ;
 31130                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 31131                                  ;
 31132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31133

 31430                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31431                                  ;
 31432                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31433                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31434                                  ;
 31435                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31436                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31437                                  ;
 31438                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31439                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31440                                  ;
 31441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31442                                  
 31443                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31444                                  
 31445                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31446                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31447                                  GetHexNum:

 31449 000029FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31450                                  ghn_next:
 31451 000029FF 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31452 00002A02 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31453 00002A05 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31454 00002A07 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31455 00002A0A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31456 00002A0C 50                      	push	ax
 31457 00002A0D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31458 00002A0F E83306                  	call	delim
 31459 00002A12 58                      	pop	ax
 31460                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31461 00002A13 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31462 00002A16 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31463 00002A18 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31464                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31465                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31466 00002A1B 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31467                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31468                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31469                                  ghn_shift1:
 31470 00002A1D D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31471 00002A1F D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31472 00002A21 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31473 00002A23 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31474 00002A25 46                      	inc	si
 31475 00002A26 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31476                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31477 00002A28 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31478 00002A2B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31479 00002A2E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31480 00002A32 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31481                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31482                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31483                                  ghn_shift2:

 31617                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31618                                  ;
 31619                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31620                                  ;
 31621                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31622                                  ;
 31623                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31624                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31625                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31626                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31627                                  ;				NC
 31628                                  ;			  else 
 31629                                  ;				CY
 31630                                  ;
 31631                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 31632                                  ;
 31633                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31634                                  
 31635                                  umb_allocate:
 31636                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31637                                  	; ds = cs
 31638 00002A9C 50                      	push	ax
 31639 00002A9D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31640 00002A9F BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 31641                                  					;   possible
 31642                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31643 00002AA2 FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31644                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31645                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 31646                                  					; the largest UMB
 31647 00002AA6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 31648 00002AA8 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 31649                                  	
 31650 00002AAA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31651                                  
 31652                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31653 00002AAC FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31654                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31655                                  
 31656 00002AB0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 31657                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 31658                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31659 00002AB3 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 31660                                  ua_err:
 31661 00002AB5 F9                      	stc	
 31662                                  
 31663                                  	;clc
 31664                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31665                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31666                                  	; cf=0
 31667                                  	;clc 
 31668                                  ua_done:
 31669 00002AB6 58                      	pop	ax
 31670 00002AB7 C3                      	retn
 31671                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31672                                  ;ua_err:
 31673                                  	;stc
 31674                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 31675                                  
 31676                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31677                                  ;
 31678                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31679                                  ;
 31680                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31681                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31682                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31683                                  ;			; DS = data
 31684                                  ;
 31685                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31686                                  ;
 31687                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31688                                  ;
 31689                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31690                                  
 31691                                  umb_insert:
 31692 00002AB8 1E                      	push	ds
 31693                                  
 31694                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31695                                  	; ds = cs
 31696                                  
 31697                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31698 00002AB9 8E1E[DA1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31699                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31700 00002ABD 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31701 00002AC1 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31702 00002AC3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31703                                  ui_next:
 31704 00002AC5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31705                                  					;    new block
 31706 00002AC7 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31707                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31708                                  					;    last
 31709 00002AC9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31710 00002ACF 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31711                                  					; N: get next block
 31712 00002AD1 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31713                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31714 00002AD3 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31715 00002AD6 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31716                                  
 31717                                  ui_insert:
 31718 00002AD8 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31719 00002ADA 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31720                                  
 31721 00002ADB 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31722 00002ADD F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31723                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31724 00002ADF C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31725                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 31726 00002AE4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31727                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 31728 00002AEA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 31729                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 31730 00002AEE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31731                                  
 31732                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31733                                  
 31734 00002AF4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31735 00002AF6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31736 00002AFC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 31737                                  					; mark as free
 31738 00002B03 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 31739                                  					; start & end of new block
 31740 00002B06 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31741                                  
 31742                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31743                                  	
 31744 00002B0B 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 31745 00002B0D 43                      	inc	bx
 31746 00002B0E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 31747 00002B10 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31748                                  
 31749                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31750                                  					; this block
 31751 00002B11 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31752                                  	
 31753 00002B13 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31754 00002B19 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31755 00002B20 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31756 00002B24 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31757                                  
 31758 00002B2B EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31759                                  
 31760                                  ui_append:
 31761                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 31762 00002B2D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31763 00002B32 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31764                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31765                                  					; block for the next arena.
 31766                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31767 00002B38 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31768                                  
 31769 00002B3E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 31770 00002B40 40                      	inc	ax
 31771 00002B41 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 31772                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 31773 00002B43 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31774                                  
 31775 00002B45 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 31776                                  
 31777 00002B47 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31778 00002B4D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31779 00002B54 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31780 00002B58 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31781                                  
 31782                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31783 00002B5F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31784 00002B61 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31785 00002B67 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 31786                                  					; mark as free
 31787 00002B6E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 31788 00002B6F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 31789                                  ui_done:
 31790                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 31791 00002B74 1F                      	pop	ds
 31792                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 31793                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 31794 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 31795                                  
 31796                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31797                                  
 31798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31799                                  ;
 31800                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 31801                                  ;
 31802                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 31803                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 31804                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 31805                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 31806                                  ;
 31807                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 31808                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 31809                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 31810                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 31811                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 31812                                  ;
 31813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31814                                  
 31815                                  umb_coalesce:
 31816                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31817                                  	; ds = cs
 31818 00002B76 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 31819                                  
 31820 00002B77 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 31821                                  
 31822                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31823                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31824 00002B79 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 31825 00002B7D 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 31826                                  uc_nextfree:
 31827 00002B82 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31828 00002B84 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31829                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 31830 00002B86 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 31831 00002B8B 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 31832                                  					; N: get next arena
 31833 00002B8D E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 31834 00002B90 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31835 00002B92 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 31836                                  uc_again:
 31837 00002B94 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 31838 00002B97 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31839                                  uc_check:
 31840 00002B99 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 31841 00002B9E 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 31842                                  					; Y: coalesce
 31843 00002BA0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 31844 00002BA5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 31845                                  	;add	[3],cx
 31846 00002BA6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 31847 00002BAA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 31848 00002BAD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 31849 00002BAF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 31850                                  
 31851                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31852                                  ;uc_done:
 31853                                  	;retn
 31854                                  
 31855                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31856                                  ;
 31857                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 31858                                  ;
 31859                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 31860                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 31861                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 31862                                  ;
 31863                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31864                                  
 31865                                  	; 01/11/2022
 31866                                  get_next:
 31867 00002BB1 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31868 00002BB6 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 31869                                  _get_next_:
 31870 00002BB8 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 31871 00002BBA 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 31872 00002BBE 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 31873 00002BBF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31874                                  	;clc
 31875                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31876                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31877                                  	; cf=0
 31878                                  	;clc
 31879 00002BC1 C3                      	retn
 31880                                  gn_err:
 31881 00002BC2 F9                      	stc
 31882                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 31883                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 31884 00002BC3 C3                      	retn

 31886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31887                                  ;
 31888                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 31889                                  ;
 31890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31891                                  
 31892                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31893                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 31894                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 31895                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31896                                  	; ds = cs
 31897 00002BC4 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 31898 00002BC7 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 31899                                  
 31900                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 31901                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 31902                                  
 31903                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31904                                  	; ds = cs
 31905                                  
 31906 00002BC9 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 31907 00002BCB B106                    	mov	cl,6
 31908 00002BCD D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 31909                                  
 31910 00002BCF 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 31911 00002BD1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 31912                                  
 31913 00002BD3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31914                                  
 31915 00002BD5 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 31916 00002BD8 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 31917                                  	
 31918 00002BDA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31919 00002BE0 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31920                                  					
 31921 00002BE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31922 00002BEB 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31923                                  
 31924                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 31925                                  
 31926 00002BF2 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 31927 00002BF4 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31928 00002BFA 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 31929                                  					; mark as free 
 31930 00002C01 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 31931 00002C02 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 31932                                  
 31933                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31934                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31935 00002C07 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 31936 00002C0B BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 31937 00002C0E 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 31938                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 31939                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 31940                                  
 31941                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 31942                                  
 31943 00002C11 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 31944 00002C14 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 31945 00002C17 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 31946                                  ;scan_next
 31947                                  ; 09/12/2022
 31948                                  scannext:
 31949 00002C19 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31950 00002C1D 740C                    	je	short got_last
 31951                                  	
 31952 00002C1F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31953 00002C21 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31954 00002C26 40                      	inc	ax
 31955 00002C27 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31956                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 31957                                  	; 09/12/2022
 31958 00002C29 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 31959                                  got_last:
 31960 00002C2B 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 31961 00002C31 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31962                                  	;clc
 31963                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31964                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31965                                  	; cf=0
 31966                                  	;clc
 31967 00002C37 C3                      	retn
 31968                                  
 31969                                  ; 11/12/2022
 31970                                  ;;lfu_err:
 31971                                  ;	;stc
 31972                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31973                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 31974                                  ;	; cf=1
 31975                                  ;	;stc
 31976                                  ;	retn
 31977                                  
 31978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31979                                  ;
 31980                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 31981                                  ;
 31982                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 31983                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 31984                                  ;
 31985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31986                                  
 31987                                  ShrinkUMB:
 31988                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31989                                  	; ds = cs
 31990 00002C38 833E[BD1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 31991                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 31992 00002C3D 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 31993 00002C3F 06                      	push	es
 31994 00002C40 53                      	push	bx
 31995                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31996                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 31997                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 31998                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 31999 00002C41 8B1E[C11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32000 00002C45 2B1E[BD1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32001 00002C49 8E06[BD1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32002                                  	
 32003 00002C4D B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32004 00002C50 CD21                    	int	21h
 32005                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32006                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32007                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32008 00002C52 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32009 00002C54 48                      	dec	ax
 32010 00002C55 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32011 00002C57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32012 00002C5E 5B                      	pop	bx
 32013 00002C5F 07                      	pop	es
 32014                                  su_exit:
 32015 00002C60 C3                      	retn

 32019                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 32020                                  ;
 32021                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32022                                  ;

 32024                                  
 32025                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32026                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32027                                  	; ds = cs
 32028 00002C61 1E                      	push	ds
 32029 00002C62 06                      	push	es
 32030                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32031 00002C63 803E[D91E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32032                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32033 00002C68 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32034                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32035 00002C6A 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32036                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32037 00002C6E 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32038 00002C73 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32039                                  ulu_next:
 32040 00002C78 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32041 00002C7B 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32042 00002C7D 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32043 00002C7F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32044 00002C81 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32045 00002C83 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32046                                  ulu_found:
 32047                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32048 00002C85 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32049                                  ulu_x:
 32050 00002C8A 07                      	pop	es
 32051 00002C8B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32052 00002C8C C3                      	retn

 32054                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32055                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32056                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32057                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32058                                  
 32059                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32060                                  ;
 32061                                  ; Summary:
 32062                                  ;
 32063                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32064                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32065                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32066                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32067                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32068                                  ;
 32069                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32070                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32071                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32072                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32073                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32074                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32075                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32076                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32077                                  ;
 32078                                  ; Example:
 32079                                  ;
 32080                                  ;   [menu]
 32081                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32082                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32083                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32084                                  ;
 32085                                  ;   [network]
 32086                                  ;   include misc
 32087                                  ;   device=foo
 32088                                  ;
 32089                                  ;   [misc]
 32090                                  ;   device=bar
 32091                                  ;   include alternate
 32092                                  ;
 32093                                  ;   [alternate]
 32094                                  ;   device=tar
 32095                                  ;
 32096                                  ;
 32097                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32098                                  ;
 32099                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32100                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32101                                  ;
 32102                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32103                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32104                                  ;   following order:
 32105                                  ;
 32106                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32107                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32108                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32109                                  ;
 32110                                  
 32111                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32112                                  
 32113                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32114                                  
 32115                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32116                                  
 32117                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32118                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32119                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32120                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32121                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32122                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32123                                  
 32124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32125                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32126                                  
 32127                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32128                                  
 32129                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32130                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32131                                  
 32132 00002C8D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32133                                  
 32134                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32135                                  ;
 32136                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32137                                  ;
 32138                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32139                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32140                                  ;
 32141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32142                                  
 32143                                  setparms:
 32144 00002C8E 1E                      	push	ds
 32145 00002C8F 50                      	push	ax
 32146 00002C90 53                      	push	bx
 32147 00002C91 51                      	push	cx
 32148 00002C92 52                      	push	dx
 32149                                  
 32150 00002C93 0E                      	push	cs
 32151 00002C94 1F                      	pop	ds
 32152                                  
 32153 00002C95 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx

 32248                                  ; procedure : parseline

 32250                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.

 32259

 32262                                  
 32263                                  nextswtch:
 32264                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32265                                  	je	short done_line
 32266                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32267                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32268                                  
 32269                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32270

 32273                                  	cmp	al,'/'

 32276                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32277

 32280                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32281                                  	jc	short swterr

 32284                                  	jc	short done_line
 32285                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32286                                  swterr:

 32288                                  
 32289                                  done_line:

 32302                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32303                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32304                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32305                                  	; cf=0
 32306                                  	;clc

 32309                                  	pop	ds

 32319                                  ;
 32320                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32321                                  ;
 32322                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32323                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32324                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32325                                  ; error.
 32326                                  ;
 32327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32328                                  
 32329                                  check_switch:
 32330 00002CE1 E81BFA                  	call	getchr
 32331                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32332 00002CE4 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32333 00002CE6 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32334 00002CE8 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32335                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32336 00002CEA 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32337 00002CEC 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32338 00002CEE 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32339                                  
 32340 00002CF0 06                      	push	es
 32341                                  
 32342 00002CF1 0E                      	push	cs
 32343 00002CF2 07                      	pop	es
 32344                                  
 32345 00002CF3 8A0E[EA36]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32346 00002CF7 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32347 00002CF9 BF[EB36]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32348 00002CFC F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32349                                  
 32350 00002CFE 07                      	pop	es
 32351 00002CFF 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32352                                  
 32353 00002D01 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32354 00002D04 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32355 00002D06 8B1E[5736]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32356 00002D0A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32357 00002D0C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32358                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32359 00002D0E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32360                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32361 00002D10 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch

 32364 00002D15 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch

 32370 00002D1E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32371                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 32373                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32381                                  
 32382                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32383                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32384                                  ; further on (hopefully).

 32386 00002D2D E80500                  	call	process_num

 32578                                  ;
 32579                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32580                                  ;
 32581                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32582                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32583                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32584                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32585                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32586                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32587                                  ;
 32588                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32589                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32590                                  ;
 32591                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32592                                  ;
 32593                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32594                                  
 32595                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32596                                  
 32597                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32598                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32599                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32600                                  	; ds = cs
 32601                                  	
 32602 00002DA9 06                      	push	es
 32603                                  
 32604 00002DAA 0E                      	push	cs
 32605 00002DAB 07                      	pop	es
 32606                                  
 32607 00002DAC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32608 00002DAE 8A1E[2F35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32609 00002DB2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32610 00002DB5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32611                                  
 32612 00002DB7 C706[3235]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32613                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32614                                  got_80:
 32615 00002DBD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32616 00002DBF 8BB7[D636]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32617                                  
 32618                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32619                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32620 00002DC3 BF[3535]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32621 00002DC6 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 32633

 32635                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax

 32645                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax

 32675                                  
 32676                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32677                                  
 32678 00002DFB 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32679                                  
 32680                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32681                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32682                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32683                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32684                                  
 32685                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32686                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32687                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32688                                  
 32689 00002DFD 833E[4235]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18

 32692 00002E09 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32693

 32695

 32697                                  
 32698                                  ;	check for 320K
 32699

 32705

 32707 00002E1D EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32708

 32712

 32714 00002E24 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32715                                  
 32716                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32717                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32718                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch

 32746 00002E47 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors

 33092 00002F81 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 33093 00002F82 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 33094                                  
 33095                                  end_copy_file:
 33096 00002F84 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 33097 00002F89 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33098 00002F8B 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33099 00002F8D EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 33100                                  
 33101                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 33102 00002F8F E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 33103 00002F92 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33104                                  
 33105 00002F94 E86200                  	call	get2
 33106 00002F97 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 33107 00002F9A 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 33108 00002F9C EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 33109                                  
 33110                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 33111 00002F9E E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 33112 00002FA1 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33113 00002FA3 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 33114                                  
 33115                                  org51:
 33116 00002FA6 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 33117 00002FA7 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 33118 00002FA9 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 33119 00002FAB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 33120 00002FAD 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 33121                                  					; M051 - Start
 33122                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33123                                  	; ds = cs
 33124 00002FAF 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 33125                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 33126 00002FB4 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33127 00002FB6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33128 00002FB8 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33129 00002FBA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33130 00002FBC 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33131 00002FBE 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33132 00002FC3 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33133 00002FC4 FE06[8D2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33134                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33135                                  					; inserted
 33136 00002FC8 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33137                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33138                                  
 33139 00002FCA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33140 00002FCC 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33141 00002FCE EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33142                                  
 33143                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33144                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33145                                  	; ds = cs
 33146 00002FD0 803E[8D2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33147                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33148 00002FD5 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
