 33149 00002FD7 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33150 00002FDC AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33151                                  					; M051 - End
 33152                                  org1_brdg:
 33153 00002FDD C606[8D2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33154                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33155                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33156 00002FE2 E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33157                                  
 33158                                  at_quote:
 33159 00002FE5 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33160                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33161 00002FEA 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33162                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33163 00002FEC C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33164 00002FF1 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33165                                  
 33166                                  up_level:
 33167                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 33168 00002FF3 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33169 00002FF7 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 33170                                  
 33171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33172                                  ;
 33173                                  ; procedure : get2
 33174                                  ;
 33175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33176                                  
 33177                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33178                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33179                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33180                                  get2:
 33181 00002FF9 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33182                                  	;
 33183                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33184                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33185                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33186 00002FFB 26                      	es	
 33187 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 33188                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33189                                  	;inc	si
 33190                                  	;
 33191 00002FFD 49                      	dec	cx
 33192 00002FFE C3                      	retn
 33193                                  noget:
 33194 00002FFF 59                      	pop	cx
 33195                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33196                                  	; ds = cs
 33197                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33198                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33199 00003000 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33200 00003004 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33201 00003008 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33202                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33203 0000300A 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33204                                  
 33205                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33206                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33207                                  ;;	retn
 33208                                  ;;else
 33209                                  ;
 33210                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33211                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33212                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33213                                  ;
 33214                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33215                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33216                                  ;;endif
 33217                                  
 33218                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33219 0000300E C3                      	retn
 33220                                  
 33221                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33222                                  ;
 33223                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33224                                  ;
 33225                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33226                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33227                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33228                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33229                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33230                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33231                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33232                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33233                                  ;
 33234                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33235                                  
 33236                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33237                                  
 33238                                  skip_comment:
 33239 0000300F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33240                                  
 33241                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33242                                  	; ds = cs	
 33243                                  
 33244 00003011 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33245                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33246 00003016 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33247                                  
 33248 00003018 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33249                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33250 0000301D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33251                                  
 33252 0000301F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33253                                  	
 33254 00003022 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33255                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33256 00003026 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33257                                  
 33258 00003028 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33259                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33260 0000302D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33261                                  
 33262 0000302F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33263                                  	
 33264 00003033 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33265                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33266 00003037 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33267                                  skip_cmmt:
 33268 00003039 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33269 0000303B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33270 0000303E 46                      	inc	si
 33271 0000303F 49                      	dec	cx
 33272 00003040 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33273 00003042 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33274                                  no_commt:
 33275 00003044 C3                      	retn
 33276                                  
 33277                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33278                                  %if 0
 33279                                  
 33280                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33281                                  
 33282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33283                                  ;
 33284                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33285                                  ;
 33286                                  ;   INPUT
 33287                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33288                                  ;
 33289                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33290                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33291                                  ;
 33292                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33293                                  ;       All
 33294                                  ;
 33295                                  ;   HISTORY
 33296                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33297                                  ;
 33298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33299                                  
 33300                                  kbd_read:
 33301                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33302                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33303                                  
 33304                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33305                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33306                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33307                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33308                                  kbd_loop:
 33309                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33310                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33311                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33312                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33313                                          int     16h             ;
 33314                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33315                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33316                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33317                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33318                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33319                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33320                                  
 33321                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33322                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33323                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33324                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33325                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33326                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33327                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33328                                          int     16h             ;
 33329                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33330                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33331                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33332                                          inc     bx
 33333                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33334                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33335                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33336                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33337                                          int     16h             ;
 33338                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33339                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33340                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33341                                  
 33342                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33343                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33344                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33345                                  	
 33346                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33347                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33348                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33349                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33350                                          call    print
 33351                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33352                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33353                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33354                                  kbd_notf5:
 33355                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33356                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33357                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33358                                  
 33359                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33360                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33361                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33362                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33363                                          call    print           ;
 33364                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33365                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33366                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33367                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33368                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33369                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33370                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33371                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33372                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33373                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33374                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33375                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33376                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33377                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33378                                          retn			;
 33379                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33380                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33381                                          retn			;
 33382                                  
 33383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33384                                  ;
 33385                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33386                                  ;
 33387                                  ;   INPUT
 33388                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33389                                  ;
 33390                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33391                                  ;       None
 33392                                  ;
 33393                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33394                                  ;       None
 33395                                  ;
 33396                                  ;   HISTORY
 33397                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33398                                  ;
 33399                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33400                                  
 33401                                  set_numlock:
 33402                                          push    ax
 33403                                          push    ds
 33404                                          sub     ax,ax
 33405                                          mov     ds,ax
 33406                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33407                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33408                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33409                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33410                                          jmp     short set_done
 33411                                  not_off:
 33412                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33413                                          stc
 33414                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33415                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33416                                  set_done:
 33417                                          pop     ds
 33418                                          pop     ax
 33419                                          retn
 33420                                  
 33421                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33422                                  
 33423                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33424                                  ;
 33425                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33426                                  ;
 33427                                  ;   INPUT
 33428                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33429                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33430                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33431                                  ;
 33432                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33433                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33434                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33435                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33436                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33437                                  ;
 33438                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33439                                  ;       All
 33440                                  ;
 33441                                  ;   NOTES
 33442                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33443                                  ;
 33444                                  ;   HISTORY
 33445                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33446                                  ;
 33447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33448                                  
 33449                                  menu_check:
 33450                                  
 33451                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33452                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33453                                  
 33454                                          push    cx              ;
 33455                                          push    si              ;
 33456                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33457                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33458                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33459                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33460                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33461                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33462                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33463                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33464                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33465                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33466                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33467                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33468                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33469                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33470                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33471                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33472                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33473                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33474                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33475                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33476                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33477                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33478                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33479                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33480                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33481                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33482                                          call    get_char        ;
 33483                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33484                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33485                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33486                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33487                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33488                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33489                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33490                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33491                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33492                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33493                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33494                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33495                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33496                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33497                                          pop     si              ;
 33498                                          pop     cx              ;
 33499                                  
 33500                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33501                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33502                                  
 33503                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33504                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33505                                  ;
 33506                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33507                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33508                                  ;
 33509                                          call    kbd_read
 33510                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33511                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33512                                  
 33513                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33514                                  
 33515                                  menu_search:
 33516                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33517                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33518                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33519                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33520                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33521                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33522                                  
 33523                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33524                                  
 33525                                  menu_color:
 33526                                          push    cx              ;
 33527                                          push    dx              ;
 33528                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33529                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33530                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33531                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33532                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33533                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33534                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33535                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33536                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33537                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33538                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33539                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33540                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33541                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33542                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33543                                  check_color:                    ;
 33544                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33545                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33546                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33547                                  set_color:
 33548                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33549                                          pop     dx              ;
 33550                                          pop     cx              ;
 33551                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33552                                  
 33553                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33554                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33555                                  
 33556                                  menu_found:
 33557                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33558                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33559                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33560                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33561                                  
 33562                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33563                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33564                                  
 33565                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33566                                  
 33567                                  menu_process:
 33568                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33569                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33570                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33571                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33572                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33573                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33574                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33575                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33576                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33577                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33578                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33579                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33580                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33581                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33582                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33583                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33584                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33585                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33586                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33587                                          stc                     ;
 33588                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33589                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33590                                  menu_numlock:
 33591                                          call    set_numlock
 33592                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33593                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33594                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33595                                  
 33596                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33597                                  
 33598                                  menu_default:
 33599                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33600                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33601                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33602                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33603                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33604                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33605                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33606                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33607                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33608                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33609                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33610                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33611                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33612                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33613                                  timeout_skip:
 33614                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33615                                  
 33616                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33617                                  
 33618                                  menu_item:
 33619                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33620                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33621                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33622                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33623                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33624                                          stc                     ;
 33625                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33626                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33627                                  
 33628                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33629                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33630                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33631                                  
 33632                                  menu_itemfound:
 33633                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33634                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33635                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33636                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33637                                  
 33638                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33639                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33640                                  ;   description...
 33641                                  
 33642                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33643                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33644                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33645                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33646                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33647                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33648                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33649                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33650                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33651                                  
 33652                                  menu_nextitem:
 33653                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33654                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33655                                  
 33656                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33657                                  
 33658                                  menu_getdefault:
 33659                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33660                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33661                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33662                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33663                                  menu_valid:
 33664                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33665                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33666                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33667                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33668                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33669                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33670                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33671                                          push    bx              ;
 33672                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33673                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33674                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33675                                          push    ds              ;
 33676                                          push    es              ;
 33677                                          pop     ds              ;
 33678                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33679                                          pop     ds              ;
 33680                                          pop     bx              ;
 33681                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33682                                          inc     bx              ;
 33683                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33684                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33685                                  menu_nodefault:
 33686                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33687                                  menu_setdefault:
 33688                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33689                                  
 33690                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33691                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33692                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33693                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33694                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33695                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33696                                  
 33697                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33698                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33699                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33700                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33701                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33702                                  
 33703                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33704                                  
 33705                                  menu_display:
 33706                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33707                                          int     10h             ;
 33708                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33709                                          int     10h             ;
 33710                                          push    es              ;
 33711                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33712                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33713                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33714                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33715                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33716                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33717                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33718                                          int     10h             ;
 33719                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33720                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33721                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33722                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33723                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33724                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33725                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33726                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33727                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33728                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33729                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33730                                  menu_clear:
 33731                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33732                                          pop     es              ;
 33733                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33734                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33735                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33736                                  
 33737                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33738                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33739                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33740                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33741                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33742                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33743                                          int     10h             ;
 33744                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33745                                          call    print           ;
 33746                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33747                                          int     10h             ;
 33748                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33749                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33750                                  
 33751                                  menu_nostatus:
 33752                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33753                                  menu_disploop:
 33754                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33755                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33756                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33757                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33758                                  
 33759                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33760                                  
 33761                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33762                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33763                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33764                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33765                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33766                                          int     10h             ;
 33767                                  
 33768                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33769                                          call    print           ;
 33770                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33771                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33772                                          call    print           ;
 33773                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33774                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33775                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 33776                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 33777                                  
 33778                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 33779                                  
 33780                                  menu_autoselect:
 33781                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 33782                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 33783                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 33784                                  menu_abort:
 33785                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 33786                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 33787                                  
 33788                                  normal_boot:
 33789                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 33790                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 33791                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 33792                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33793                                          jmp     menu_search
 33794                                  
 33795                                  not_topmenu:
 33796                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33797                                          jne	short not_submenu
 33798                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33799                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33800                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 33801                                          mov     si,di           ;
 33802                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 33803                                          jmp     menu_found
 33804                                  
 33805                                  not_submenu:
 33806                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 33807                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33808                                  
 33809                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 33810                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 33811                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 33812                                  
 33813                                  no_selection:
 33814                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 33815                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 33816                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33817                                          push    ds              ;
 33818                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 33819                                          sub     di,di           ;
 33820                                  
 33821                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 33822                                  ;
 33823                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 33824                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 33825                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 33826                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 33827                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 33828                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 33829                                  ;
 33830                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 33831                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 33832                                  
 33833                                  copyblock_loop:
 33834                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 33835                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 33836                                          pop     bx              ;
 33837                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33838                                  
 33839                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 33840                                  
 33841                                  copyblock_begin:
 33842                                          push    ax              ;
 33843                                          push    cx              ;
 33844                                          push    si              ;
 33845                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 33846                                          mov     di,szCommon
 33847                                          push    ds              ;
 33848                                          push    cs              ;
 33849                                          pop     ds              ;
 33850                                          call    comp_names      ;
 33851                                          pop     ds              ;
 33852                                          pop     di              ;
 33853                                          pop     si              ;
 33854                                          pop     cx              ;
 33855                                          pop     ax              ;
 33856                                          je	short copyblock_check
 33857                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 33858                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 33859                                          push    di              ;
 33860                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 33861                                          push    ds              ;
 33862                                          push    es              ;
 33863                                          pop     ds              ;
 33864                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 33865                                          pop     ds              ;
 33866                                          pop     di              ;
 33867                                  copyblock_check:
 33868                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33869                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 33870                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33871                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 33872                                  
 33873                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 33874                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 33875                                          call    get_char        ;
 33876                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33877                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33878                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33879                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 33880                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 33881                                  ;
 33882                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 33883                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 33884                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 33885                                  ;
 33886                                  move_config:
 33887                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 33888                                          push    cx              ;
 33889                                  ;
 33890                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 33891                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 33892                                  ;
 33893                                   	;mov	cx,7
 33894                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 33895                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 33896                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 33897                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 33898                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 33899                                  copy_boot: 
 33900                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 33901                                          cs
 33902                                  	lodsb
 33903                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 33904                                          inc     di              ;
 33905                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 33906                                  
 33907                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 33908                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 33909                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 33910                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 33911                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 33912                                          push    cs              ;
 33913                                          pop     es              ;
 33914                                          mov     si,szCommon
 33915                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 33916                                          call    any_delim       ;
 33917                                          je	short l2	;
 33918                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 33919                                          inc     si              ;
 33920                                          inc     di              ;
 33921                                          loop    l1              ;
 33922                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 33923                                          pop     es              ;
 33924                                  
 33925                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 33926                                  
 33927                                          sub     di,di           ;
 33928                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 33929                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33930                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 33931                                  
 33932                                          push    cx              ;
 33933                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 33934                                          pop     cx              ;
 33935                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 33936                                          pop     ds              ;
 33937                                  
 33938                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 33939                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 33940                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 33941                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 33942                                  ;   is empty.
 33943                                  
 33944                                          push    es              ;
 33945                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 33946                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 33947                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 33948                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 33949                                          pop     es
 33950                                  
 33951                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 33952                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 33953                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 33954                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 33955                                  
 33956                                  menu_done:
 33957                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 33958                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 33959                                          push    es              ;
 33960                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 33961                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 33962                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 33963                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 33964                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 33965                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 33966                                          pop     es              ;
 33967                                  menu_exit:
 33968                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 33969                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 33970                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 33971                                          retn
 33972                                  
 33973                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33974                                  ;
 33975                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 33976                                  ;
 33977                                  ;   INPUT
 33978                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 33979                                  ;
 33980                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33981                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 33982                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 33983                                  ;
 33984                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33985                                  ;       None
 33986                                  ;
 33987                                  ;   NOTES
 33988                                  ;       None
 33989                                  ;
 33990                                  ;   HISTORY
 33991                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33992                                  ;
 33993                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33994                                  
 33995                                  copy_envvar:
 33996                                          push    cx              ;
 33997                                          push    si              ;
 33998                                          push    ds              ;
 33999                                          push    es              ;
 34000                                          push    es              ;
 34001                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34002                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34003                                  
 34004                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34005                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34006                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34007                                  ;
 34008                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34009                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34010                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34011                                  
 34012                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34013                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34014                                          lodsb                   ;
 34015                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34016                                          stc                     ;
 34017                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34018                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34019                                          stc                     ;
 34020                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34021                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34022                                          stc                     ;
 34023                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34024                                          inc     cx              ;
 34025                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34026                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34027                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34028                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34029                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34030                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34031                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34032                                  copy_varsrch:
 34033                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34034                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34035                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34036                                          push    cx              ;
 34037                                          push    si              ;
 34038                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34039                                          pop     si              ;
 34040                                          pop     cx              ;
 34041                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34042                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34043                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34044                                  
 34045                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34046                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34047                                  
 34048                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34049                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34050                                          push    si              ;
 34051                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34052                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34053                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34054                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34055                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34056                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34057                                  
 34058                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34059                                  	es	; 26h
 34060                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34061                                  
 34062                                  	pop     si
 34063                                  copy_envprep:
 34064                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34065                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34066                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34067                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34068                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34069                                  
 34070                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34071                                          push    cx              ;
 34072                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34073                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34074                                          pop     cx              ;
 34075                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34076                                  
 34077                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34078                                          lodsb                   ;
 34079                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34080                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34081                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34082                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34083                                          stosb                   ;
 34084                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34085                                  
 34086                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34087                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34088                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34089                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34090                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34091                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34092                                  
 34093                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34094                                          pop     es              ;
 34095                                          pop     ds              ;
 34096                                          pop     si              ;
 34097                                          pop     cx              ;
 34098                                  
 34099                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34100                                          retn
 34101                                  
 34102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34103                                  ;
 34104                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34105                                  ;
 34106                                  ;   INPUT
 34107                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34108                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34109                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34110                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34111                                  ;
 34112                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34113                                  ;       Same as above
 34114                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34115                                  ;
 34116                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34117                                  ;       All
 34118                                  ;
 34119                                  ;   NOTES
 34120                                  ;       None
 34121                                  ;
 34122                                  ;   HISTORY
 34123                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34124                                  ;
 34125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34126                                  
 34127                                  copy_block:
 34128                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34129                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34130                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34131                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34132                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34133                                  
 34134                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34135                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34136                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34137                                  
 34138                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34139                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34140                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34141                                  
 34142                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34143                                          push    di              ;
 34144                                  
 34145                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34146                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34147                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34148                                  
 34149                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34150                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34151                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34152                                  
 34153                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34154                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34155                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34156                                          pop     di              ;
 34157                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34158                                          push    cx              ;
 34159                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34160                                          push    si              ;
 34161                                          dec     dx              ;
 34162                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34163                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34164                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34165                                          pop     si              ;
 34166                                          pop     cx              ;
 34167                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34168                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34169                                  
 34170                                  copy_skip:
 34171                                          pop     di
 34172                                  copy_error:
 34173                                          clc                     ;
 34174                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34175                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34176                                  
 34177                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34178                                  
 34179                                  copy_line:
 34180                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34181                                          inc     di              ;
 34182                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34183                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34184                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34185                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34186                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34187                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34188                                          inc     di              ;
 34189                                          inc     di              ;
 34190                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34191                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34192                                          call    get_char        ;
 34193                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34194                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34195                                          inc     di              ;
 34196                                  copy_next:
 34197                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34198                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34199                                  
 34200                                  copy_nextline:
 34201                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34202                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34203                                  
 34204                                  	; 18/12/2022
