 34205                                  ;copy_done:
 34206                                          ;retn
 34207                                  
 34208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34209                                  ;
 34210                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34211                                  ;
 34212                                  ;   INPUT
 34213                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34214                                  ;
 34215                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34216                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34217                                  ;
 34218                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34219                                  ;       DX
 34220                                  ;
 34221                                  ;   NOTES
 34222                                  ;       None
 34223                                  ;
 34224                                  ;   HISTORY
 34225                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34226                                  ;
 34227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34228                                  
 34229                                  get_linenum:
 34230                                          push    ax              ;
 34231                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34232                                          push    cx              ;
 34233                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34234                                          push    si              ;
 34235                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34236                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34237                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34238                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34239                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34240                                          inc     bx              ;
 34241                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34242                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34243                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34244                                          pop     si              ;
 34245                                          pop     cx              ;
 34246                                          pop     ax              ;
 34247                                          retn
 34248                                  
 34249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34250                                  ;
 34251                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34252                                  ;
 34253                                  ;   INPUT
 34254                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34255                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34256                                  ;
 34257                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34258                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34259                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34260                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34261                                  ;
 34262                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34263                                  ;       None
 34264                                  ;
 34265                                  ;   NOTES
 34266                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34267                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34268                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34269                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34270                                  ;
 34271                                  ;   HISTORY
 34272                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34273                                  ;
 34274                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34275                                  
 34276                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34277                                          push    ax              ;
 34278                                          push    cx              ;
 34279                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34280                                          push    si              ;
 34281                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34282                                          push    ds              ;
 34283                                          push    es              ;
 34284                                          pop     ds              ;
 34285                                          call    find_block      ;
 34286                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34287                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34288                                          pop     ds              ;
 34289                                          pop     si              ;
 34290                                          pop     cx              ;
 34291                                          pop     ax              ;
 34292                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34293                                          retn			;
 34294                                  
 34295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34296                                  ;
 34297                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34298                                  ;
 34299                                  ;   INPUT
 34300                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34301                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34302                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34303                                  ;
 34304                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34305                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34306                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34307                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34308                                  ;
 34309                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34310                                  ;       AX
 34311                                  ;
 34312                                  ;   NOTES
 34313                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34314                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34315                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34316                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34317                                  ;
 34318                                  ;   HISTORY
 34319                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34320                                  ;
 34321                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34322                                  
 34323                                  find_block:
 34324                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34325                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34326                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34327                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34328                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34329                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34330                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34331                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34332                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34333                                  check_line:
 34334                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34335                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34336                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34337                                  next_line:
 34338                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34339                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34340                                  ;find_exit:
 34341                                  ;	retn
 34342                                  
 34343                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34344                                  ;
 34345                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34346                                  ;
 34347                                  ;   INPUT
 34348                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34349                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34350                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34351                                  ;
 34352                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34353                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34354                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34355                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34356                                  ;
 34357                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34358                                  ;       AX
 34359                                  ;
 34360                                  ;   NOTES
 34361                                  ;       None
 34362                                  ;
 34363                                  ;   HISTORY
 34364                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34365                                  ;
 34366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34367                                  
 34368                                  comp_names:
 34369                                          push    di              ;
 34370                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34371                                          call    get_char        ;
 34372                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34373                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34374                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34375                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34376                                          inc     di              ;
 34377                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34378                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34379                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34380                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34381                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34382                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34383                                          pop     di              ;
 34384                                          retn			;
 34385                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34386                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34387                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34388                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34389                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34390                                  
 34391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34392                                  
 34393                                  comp_names_safe:
 34394                                          push    ax
 34395                                          push    cx
 34396                                          push	si
 34397                                          push    ds
 34398                                          push    cs
 34399                                          pop     ds
 34400                                          call    comp_names
 34401                                          pop     ds
 34402                                  	pop	si
 34403                                          pop     cx
 34404                                          pop     ax
 34405                                          retn
 34406                                  
 34407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34408                                  ;
 34409                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34410                                  ;
 34411                                  ;   INPUT
 34412                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34413                                  ;
 34414                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34415                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34416                                  ;
 34417                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34418                                  ;       None
 34419                                  ;
 34420                                  ;   NOTES
 34421                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34422                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ;   HISTORY
 34425                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34426                                  ;
 34427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34428                                  
 34429                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34430                                          push    ax              ;
 34431                                          push    bx              ;
 34432                                          push    cx              ;
 34433                                          push    dx              ;
 34434                                          push    si              ;
 34435                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34436                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34437                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34438                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34439                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34440                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34441                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34442                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34443                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34444                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34445                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34446                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34447                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34448                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34449                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34450                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34451                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34452                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34453                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34454                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34455                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34456                                  print_other:                    ;
 34457                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34458                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34459                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34460                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34461                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34462                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34463                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34464                                          int     10h             ;
 34465                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34466                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34467                                          int     10h             ;
 34468                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34469                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34470                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34471                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34472                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34473                                          int     10h             ;
 34474                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34475                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34476                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34477                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34478                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34479                                          int     10h             ;
 34480                                          push    es              ;
 34481                                  print_loop:                     ;
 34482                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34483                                          inc     di              ;
 34484                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34485                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 34486                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 34487                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 34488                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 34489                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 34490                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 34491                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 34492                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 34493                                          int     10h             ;
 34494                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34495                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 34496                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 34497                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34498                                          int     10h             ;
 34499                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 34500                                  print_done:                     ;
 34501                                          pop     es              ;
 34502                                          pop     dx              ;
 34503                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34504                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 34505                                          pop     si              ;
 34506                                          pop     dx              ;
 34507                                          pop     cx              ;
 34508                                          pop     bx              ;
 34509                                          pop     ax              ;
 34510                                          retn			;
 34511                                  
 34512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34513                                  ;
 34514                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ;   INPUT
 34517                                  ;       None
 34518                                  ;
 34519                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34520                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 34521                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 34522                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 34523                                  ;
 34524                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34525                                  ;       None
 34526                                  ;
 34527                                  ;   NOTES
 34528                                  ;       None
 34529                                  ;
 34530                                  ;   HISTORY
 34531                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34532                                  ;
 34533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34534                                  
 34535                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 34536                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 34537                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34538                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34539                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 34540                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34541                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 34542                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 34543                                          int     21h             ;
 34544                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 34545                                  check_time:
 34546                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 34547                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 34548                                          jae	short show_time	;
 34549                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 34550                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 34551                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 34552                                  show_time:
 34553                                          push    bx              ;
 34554                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 34555                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34556                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34557                                          int     10h             ;
 34558                                          push    dx              ;
 34559                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 34560                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34561                                          int     10h             ;
 34562                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 34563                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 34564                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 34565                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 34566                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 34567                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 34568                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 34569                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34570                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34571                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 34572                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 34573                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34574                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34575                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 34576                                          pop     dx
 34577                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 34578                                          int     10h             ;
 34579                                          pop     bx              ;
 34580                                  input_key:
 34581                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 34582                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 34583                                          int     21h             ;
 34584                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 34585                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 34586                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 34587                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 34588                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 34589                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 34590                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 34591                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 34592                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 34593                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 34594                                  got_time:
 34595                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 34596                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 34597                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 34598                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 34599                                  got_key:
 34600                                          push    ax              ;
 34601                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 34602                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 34603                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 34604                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 34605                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 34606                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34607                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34608                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 34609                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 34610                                          pop     bx   		;
 34611                                  
 34612                                  timeout_disabled:
 34613                                          pop     ax              ;
 34614                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 34615                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 34616                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 34617                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 34618                                  
 34619                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 34620                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 34621                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 34622                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 34623                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34624                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34625                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 34626                                          jmp     short print1
 34627                                  not_up:
 34628                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 34629                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 34630                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 34631                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 34632                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34633                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34634                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 34635                                  print1: 
 34636                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 34637                                  print2: 
 34638                                  	call    print_item      ;
 34639                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34640                                  to_input_key:
 34641                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 34642                                  not_down:
 34643                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34644                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 34645                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34646                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 34647                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 34648                                          call    show_status     ;
 34649                                          jmp     input_key	;
 34650                                  not_f8:
 34651                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34652                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 34653                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 34654                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 34655                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 34656                                  
 34657                                  normal_key:
 34658                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 34659                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 34660                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 34661                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 34662                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 34663                                          retn			;
 34664                                  not_backspace:
 34665                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 34666                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 34667                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 34668                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 34669                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 34670                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 34671                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 34672                                          jmp	short print2
 34673                                  
 34674                                  select_done:
 34675                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 34676                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34677                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 34678                                  
 34679                                  	; fall into disp_input
 34680                                  
 34681                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34682                                  
 34683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34684                                  ;
 34685                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 34686                                  ;
 34687                                  ;   INPUT
 34688                                  ;       AL == character to display
 34689                                  ;
 34690                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34691                                  ;       None
 34692                                  ;
 34693                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34694                                  ;       None
 34695                                  ;
 34696                                  ;   NOTES
 34697                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 34698                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 34699                                  ;
 34700                                  ;   HISTORY
 34701                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34702                                  ;
 34703                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34704                                  
 34705                                  disp_input:
 34706                                          push    ax
 34707                                          cmp     al,' '
 34708                                          jae	short disp_ok
 34709                                          mov     al,' '
 34710                                  disp_ok:
 34711                                          mov     dl,al
 34712                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 34713                                          int     21h
 34714                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 34715                                          call    print
 34716                                          pop     ax
 34717                                          retn
 34718                                  
 34719                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34720                                  
 34721                                  disp_num:
 34722                                          push    bx
 34723                                          add     al,'0'
 34724                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 34725                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34726                                          mov     cx,1
 34727                                          int     10h
 34728                                          pop     bx
 34729                                          retn
 34730                                  
 34731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34732                                  ;
 34733                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 34734                                  ;
 34735                                  ;   INPUT
 34736                                  ;       None
 34737                                  ;
 34738                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34739                                  ;       None
 34740                                  ;
 34741                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34742                                  ;       None
 34743                                  ;
 34744                                  ;   NOTES
 34745                                  ;       None
 34746                                  ;
 34747                                  ;   HISTORY
 34748                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34749                                  ;
 34750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34751                                  
 34752                                  show_status:
 34753                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 34754                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34755                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34756                                          int     10h             ;
 34757                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34758                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34759                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 34760                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34761                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 34762                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 34763                                          int     10h             ;
 34764                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34765                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 34766                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 34767                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 34768                                  show_onoff: 
 34769                                          int     10h
 34770                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 34771                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 34772                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 34773                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 34774                                  
 34775                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 34776                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 34777                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 34778                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 34779                                  show_noton:                     ;
 34780                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 34781                                          int     10h             ;
 34782                                  show_done:                      ;
 34783                                          pop     dx              ;
 34784                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34785                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 34786                                          pop     bx              ;
 34787                                          retn			;
 34788                                  
 34789                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34790                                  
 34791                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34792                                  ;
 34793                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 34794                                  ;
 34795                                  ;   INPUT
 34796                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34797                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34798                                  ;
 34799                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34800                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 34801                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 34802                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 34803                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34804                                  ;
 34805                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34806                                  ;       AX
 34807                                  ;
 34808                                  ;   NOTES
 34809                                  ;       None
 34810                                  ;
 34811                                  ;   HISTORY
 34812                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34813                                  ;
 34814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34815                                  
 34816                                  skip_token:
 34817                                          call    get_char
 34818                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 34819                                          call    any_delim
 34820                                          jne	short skip_token
 34821                                  skip_check_eol:
 34822                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 34823                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 34824                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34825                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 34826                                          clc
 34827                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 34828                                  	retn
 34829                                  skip_token_eol:
 34830                                          stc
 34831                                  skip_token_done:
 34832                                          retn
 34833                                  
 34834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34835                                  ;
 34836                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 34837                                  ;
 34838                                  ;   INPUT
 34839                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34840                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34841                                  ;
 34842                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34843                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34844                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 34845                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 34846                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34847                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 34848                                  ;
 34849                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34850                                  ;       AX
 34851                                  ;
 34852                                  ;   NOTES
 34853                                  ;       None
 34854                                  ;
 34855                                  ;   HISTORY
 34856                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34857                                  ;
 34858                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34859                                  
 34860                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 34861                                          call    get_char        ;
 34862                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 34863                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 34864                                          call    delim           ;
 34865                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 34866                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 34867                                  
 34868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34869                                  ;
 34870                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 34871                                  ;
 34872                                  ;   INPUT
 34873                                  ;       AL == last character read
 34874                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34875                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34876                                  ;
 34877                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34878                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34879                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 34880                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 34881                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34882                                  ;
 34883                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34884                                  ;       AX
 34885                                  ;
 34886                                  ;   NOTES
 34887                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 34888                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 34889                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 34890                                  ;
 34891                                  ;   HISTORY
 34892                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34893                                  ;
 34894                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34895                                  
 34896                                  skip_opt_line:
 34897                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34898                                          je	short skip_line_done
 34899                                       
 34900                                  	; fall into skip_line
 34901                                  
 34902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34903                                  ;
 34904                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 34905                                  ;
 34906                                  ;   INPUT
 34907                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34908                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34909                                  ;
 34910                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34911                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34912                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 34913                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34914                                  ;
 34915                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34916                                  ;       AX
 34917                                  ;
 34918                                  ;   NOTES
 34919                                  ;       None
 34920                                  ;
 34921                                  ;   HISTORY
 34922                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34923                                  ;
 34924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34925                                  
 34926                                  skip_line:
 34927                                          call    get_char
 34928                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 34929                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34930                                          jne	short skip_line
 34931                                  skip_line_done:
 34932                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34933                                          retn
 34934                                  
 34935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34936                                  ;
 34937                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 34938                                  ;
 34939                                  ;   INPUT
 34940                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34941                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34942                                  ;
 34943                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34944                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 34945                                  ;       BX == binary #
 34946                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 34947                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34948                                  ;
 34949                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34950                                  ;       AX
 34951                                  ;
 34952                                  ;   NOTES
 34953                                  ;       None
 34954                                  ;
 34955                                  ;   HISTORY
 34956                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34957                                  ;
 34958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34959                                  
 34960                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34961                                  
 34962                                  get_number:
 34963                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 34964                                  num_loop:
 34965                                          call    get_char        ;
 34966                                          jc	short num_done	;
 34967                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 34968                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 34969                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 34970                                          ja	short num_done	;
 34971                                          push    ax              ;
 34972                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 34973                                          push    dx              ;
 34974                                          mul     bx              ;
 34975                                          pop     dx              ;
 34976                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 34977                                          pop     ax              ;
 34978                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 34979                                          cbw                     ;
 34980                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 34981                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 34982                                  
 34983                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34984                                  ;num_done:
 34985                                          ;retn
 34986                                  
 34987                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34988                                  ;
 34989                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 34990                                  ;
 34991                                  ;   INPUT
 34992                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34993                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34994                                  ;
 34995                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34996                                  ;       AL == next character
 34997                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 34998                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34999                                  ;
 35000                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35001                                  ;       AX
 35002                                  ;
 35003                                  ;   NOTES
 35004                                  ;       None
 35005                                  ;
 35006                                  ;   HISTORY
 35007                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35008                                  ;
 35009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35010                                  
 35011                                  get_char:
 35012                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35013                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35014                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35015                                  	es	
 35016                                  	lodsb
 35017                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35018                                          retn			;
 35019                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35020                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35021                                  nearby_ret:
 35022                                          retn
 35023                                  
 35024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35025                                  ;
 35026                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35027                                  ;
 35028                                  ;   INPUT
 35029                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35030                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35031                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35032                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35033                                  ;
 35034                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35035                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35036                                  ;
 35037                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35038                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35039                                  ;
 35040                                  ;   NOTES
 35041                                  ;       None
 35042                                  ;
 35043                                  ;   HISTORY
 35044                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35045                                  ;
 35046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35047                                  
 35048                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35049                                  query_user:
 35050                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35051                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35052                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35053                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35054                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35055                                  qu_1:
 35056                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35057                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35058                                          push    ax                      ;
 35059                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35060                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35061                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35062                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35063                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35064                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35065                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35066                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35067                                  query_all:
 35068                                  
 35069                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35070                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35071                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35072                                  
 35073                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35074                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35075                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35076                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35077                                  
 35078                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35079                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35080                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35081                                  find_match:                             ;
 35082                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35083                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35084                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35085                                          inc     di                      ;
 35086                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35087                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35088                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35089                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35090                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35091                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35092                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35093                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35094                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35095                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35096                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35097                                          inc     di                      ;
 35098                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35099                                          int     21h                     ;
 35100                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35101                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35102                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35103                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35104                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35105                                  cmd_notset:
 35106                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35107                                  line_print:                             ;
 35108                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35109                                          es
 35110                                  	lodsb
 35111                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35112                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35113                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35114                                  non_null:                               ;
 35115                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35116                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35117                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35118                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35119                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35120                                  non_space:                              ;
 35121                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35122                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35123                                          int     21h                     ;
 35124                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35125                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35126                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35127                                  
 35128                                  generic_prompt:
 35129                                          call    print                   ;
 35130                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35131                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35132                                          int     16h                     ;
 35133                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35134                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35135                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35136                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35137                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35138                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35139                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35140                                  not_func:
 35141                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35142                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35143                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35144                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35145                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35146                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35147                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35148                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35149                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35150                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35151                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35152                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35153                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35154                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35155                                  
 35156                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35157                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35158                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35159                                  	clc
 35160                                  do_cmd:
 35161                                  	pop     ax			;
 35162                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35163                                  	; cf=0
 35164                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35165                                  	retn
 35166                                  
 35167                                  skip_cmd:
 35168                                  	pop     ax			;
 35169                                  skip_all:
 35170                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35171                                  	stc
 35172                                  	retn
 35173                                  
 35174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35177                                  ;
 35178                                  ;   INPUT
 35179                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35180                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35183                                  ;       None
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35186                                  ;       None
 35187                                  ;
 35188                                  ;   NOTES
 35189                                  ;       None
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;   HISTORY
 35192                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35193                                  ;
 35194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35195                                  
 35196                                  print_error:
 35197                                          push    ax
 35198                                          push    bx
 35199                                          push    cx
 35200                                          push    dx
 35201                                          push    ds
 35202                                          push    cs
 35203                                          pop     ds
 35204                                          pushf
 35205                                          call    get_linenum
 35206                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35207                                          call    error_line
 35208                                          popf
 35209                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35210                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35211                                          call    print
 35212                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35213                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35214                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35215                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35216                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35217                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35218                                  pe_1:     
 35219                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35220                                          call    print
 35221                                  pe_ret: 
 35222                                  	pop     ds
 35223                                          pop     dx
 35224                                          pop     cx
 35225                                          pop     bx
 35226                                          pop     ax
 35227                                  	retn
 35228                                  
 35229                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35230                                  
 35231                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35232                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35233                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35234                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35235                                  
 35236                                  disable_autoexec:
 35237                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35238                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35239                                  
 35240                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35241                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35242                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35243                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35244                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35245                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35246                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35247                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35248                                  dae_1:
 35249                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35250                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35251                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35252                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35253                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35254                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35255                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35256                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35257                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35258                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35259                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35260                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35261                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35262                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35263                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35264                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35265                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35266                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35267                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35268                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35269                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35270                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35271                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35272                                          retn
 35273                                  
 35274                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35275                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35276                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35277                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35278                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35279                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35280                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35281                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35282                                  
 35283                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35284                                  
 35285                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35286                                  
 35287                                  
 35288                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35289                                  
 35290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35291                                  ;
 35292                                  ; procedure : delim
 35293                                  ;
 35294                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35295                                  
 35296                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35297                                  ;
 35298                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35299                                  ;
 35300                                  ;any_delim:
 35301                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35302                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35303                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35304                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35305                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35306                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35307                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35308                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35309                                  ;
 35310                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35311                                  
 35312                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35313                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35314                                  delim:
 35315 00003045 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
