 35316 00003047 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35317                                  
 35318 00003049 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35319 0000304B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35320                                  
 35321                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35322 0000304D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35323 0000304F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35324 00003051 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35325 00003053 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35326 00003055 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35327 00003057 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35328 00003059 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35329 0000305B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35330 0000305D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35331                                  
 35332                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35333                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35334                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35335                                  ;	clc
 35336                                  ;;endif
 35337                                  
 35338                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35339                                  delim_ret:
 35340 0000305F C3                      	retn
 35341                                  
 35342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ; procedure : newline
 35345                                  ;
 35346                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35347                                  ;
 35348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35349                                  
 35350                                  newline:
 35351 00003060 E89CF6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35352 00003063 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35353 00003065 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35354 00003067 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35355 00003069 E893F6                  	call	getchr
 35356                                  nl_ret:
 35357 0000306C C3                      	retn

 35360                                  ; 
 35361                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35362                                  ;
 35363                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35364                                  
 35365                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35366                                  mapcase:
 35367 0000306D 51                      	push	cx
 35368 0000306E 56                      	push	si
 35369 0000306F 1E                      	push	ds
 35370                                  
 35371 00003070 06                      	push	es
 35372 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 35373                                  
 35374                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35375                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35376                                  ;
 35377                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35378                                  ;;else
 35379                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35380                                  ;;endif
 35381                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35382 00003072 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35383                                  
 35384                                  convloop:
 35385 00003074 AC                      	lodsb
 35386 00003075 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35387 00003077 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35388 00003079 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35389 0000307B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35390 0000307D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35391 0000307F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35392                                  noconv:
 35393                                  
 35394                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35395                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35396                                  ;;
 35397                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35398                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35399                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35400                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35401                                  ;;
 35402                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35403                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35404                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35405                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35406                                  ;check_eol:
 35407                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35408                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35409                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35410                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35411                                  ;;endif
 35412                                  	
 35413                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35414 00003082 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35415                                  convdone:
 35416 00003084 1F                      	pop	ds
 35417 00003085 5E                      	pop	si
 35418 00003086 59                      	pop	cx
 35419 00003087 C3                      	retn
 35420                                  
 35421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ; procedure : round
 35424                                  ;
 35425                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35426                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35427                                  ;
 35428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35429                                  
 35430                                  round:
 35431 00003088 50                      	push	ax
 35432 00003089 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35433                                  
 35434 0000308D E830E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35435                                  
 35436 00003090 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35437 00003095 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35438 0000309C 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35439 000030A0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35440 000030A5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35441 000030A7 2EF606[3414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35442 000030AD 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35443 000030AF 06                      	push	es
 35444 000030B0 56                      	push	si
 35445 000030B1 2E8B36[3214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35446 000030B6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35447 000030B8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35448 000030BA 48                      	dec	ax
 35449                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35450 000030BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35451 000030BF 2E8026[3414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35452 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35453 000030C6 07                      	pop	es
 35454                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35455 000030C7 58                      	pop	ax
 35456                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35457                                  	; cf = 0
 35458                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35459                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35460 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35461                                  
 35462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35463                                  
 35464                                  mem_err:
 35465                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35466 000030C9 0E                      	push	cs
 35467 000030CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 35468                                  mem_err2:
 35469 000030CB BA[F137]                	mov	dx,badmem
 35470                                  	;push	cs
 35471                                  	;pop	ds
 35472 000030CE E87602                  	call	print
 35473 000030D1 E97FD7                  	jmp	stall

 35477                                  ; procedure : calldev
 35478                                  ;
 35479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35480                                  
 35481                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35482                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 35483                                  calldev:
 35484 000030D4 2E8E1E[B61E]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 35485 000030D9 2E031E[B41E]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 35486 000030DE 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 35487                                  
 35488 000030E0 2EFF36[B41E]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 35489 000030E5 2EA3[B41E]              	mov	word [cs:DevEntry],ax
 35490 000030E9 BB[E603]                	mov	bx,packet
 35491 000030EC 2EFF1E[B41E]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 35492 000030F1 2E8F06[B41E]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 35493 000030F6 C3                      	retn

 35497                                  ; procedure : todigit
 35498                                  ;
 35499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35500                                  
 35501                                  todigit:
 35502 000030F7 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 35503                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35504                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35505 000030F9 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35506                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35507                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35508                                  	;clc
 35509                                  	;retn
 35510                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35511 000030FB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 35512 000030FD F5                      	cmc
 35513                                  notdig:
 35514                                  	;stc
 35515                                  notdig2:
 35516 000030FE C3                      	retn
 35517                                  
 35518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35523                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35524                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35525                                  ;
 35526                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35527                                  
 35528                                  getnum:
 35529 000030FF 53                      	push	bx
 35530 00003100 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35531                                  b2:
 35532 00003102 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35533 00003105 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35534                                  
 35535 00003107 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35536 00003108 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35537                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35538                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35539 00003109 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35540 0000310B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35541 0000310D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35542 0000310E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35543 00003110 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35544 00003113 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35545                                  
 35546 00003115 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35547                                  
 35548 00003116 E8E6F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35549 00003119 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35550 0000311B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35551 0000311D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35552 0000311F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35553 00003121 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35554 00003123 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35555 00003125 7417                    	je	short b15
 35556 00003127 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35557 0000312C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35558 0000312E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35559                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35560                                  	;nop
 35561                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35562                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35563                                  	;nop
 35564                                  	;nop
 35565 00003130 740C                    	je	short b15
 35566 00003132 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35567 00003134 7408                    	je	short b15
 35568 00003136 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35569 00003138 7404                    	je	short b15
 35570 0000313A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35571 0000313C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35572                                  b15:
 35573 0000313E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35574 00003143 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35575                                  b1:
 35576 00003148 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35577 0000314A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35578 0000314C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35579 0000314D C3                      	retn
 35580                                  badnum:
 35581                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35582                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35583 0000314E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35584                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35585 00003150 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35586 00003154 5B                      	pop	bx
 35587 00003155 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35588 00003156 C3                      	retn
 35589                                  
 35590                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35591                                  
 35592                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35593                                  
 35594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35595                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35596                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35597                                  ;	si = 0
 35598                                  ;	ax = country id
 35599                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35600                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35601                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35602                                  ;
 35603                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35604                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35605                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35606                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35608                                  
 35609 00003157 57                      	push	di
 35610 00003158 50                      	push	ax
 35611 00003159 52                      	push	dx
 35612                                  
 35613 0000315A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35614 0000315C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35615 0000315E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35616 00003161 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35617 00003164 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35618                                  
 35619 00003166 06                      	push	es
 35620 00003167 56                      	push	si
 35621                                  
 35622 00003168 0E                      	push	cs
 35623 00003169 07                      	pop	es
 35624                                  
 35625 0000316A BF[1334]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35626 0000316D B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35627 00003170 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35628                                  
 35629 00003172 5E                      	pop	si
 35630 00003173 07                      	pop	es
 35631 00003174 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35632                                  
 35633 00003176 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35634 00003179 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35635 0000317C 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35636                                  
 35637 0000317E 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35638 0000317F 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35639 00003181 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35640 00003184 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35641 00003187 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35642 0000318A 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35643                                  
 35644 0000318C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35645 0000318E 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35646 00003192 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35647                                  
 35648 00003194 46                      	inc	si
 35649 00003195 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35650 00003196 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35651 00003197 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35652 00003198 5F                      	pop	di
 35653                                  
 35654                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35655 00003199 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35656 0000319C 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35657                                  
 35658 0000319E 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35659 000031A1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35660 000031A3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35661 000031A6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35662                                  
 35663                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35664 000031A8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35665 000031AA 46                      	inc	si
 35666 000031AB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35667 000031AC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 35668                                  
 35669 000031AE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 35670                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 35671 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 35672 000031B2 C3                      	retn
 35673                                  
 35674                                  setdosdata_fail:
 35675 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 35676 000031B4 59                      	pop	cx
 35677 000031B5 5F                      	pop	di
 35678 000031B6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 35679                                  
 35680                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 35681 000031B8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 35682                                  
 35683                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 35684 000031BB 2E8916[1B34]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 35685 000031C0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 35686 000031C3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 35687 000031C6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 35688 000031C9 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 35689 000031CC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 35690                                  
 35691 000031CE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 35692 000031D0 46                      	inc	si
 35693 000031D1 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 35694                                  
 35695                                  setdoscntry_data:
 35696 000031D2 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35697 000031D3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 35698 000031D4 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 35699                                  
 35700 000031D5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 35701 000031D8 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 35702 000031DB 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 35703                                  
 35704 000031DD 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 35705 000031E0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 35706 000031E3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35707 000031E6 F9                      	stc
 35708 000031E7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35709 000031E9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35710                                  
 35711 000031EB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 35712 000031EE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 35713 000031F1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 35714 000031F3 F9                      	stc
 35715 000031F4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 35716 000031F6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 35717                                  
 35718 000031F8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 35719 000031FA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 35720                                  
 35721 000031FC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 35722 000031FF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 35723 00003202 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35724 00003205 F9                      	stc
 35725 00003206 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 35726 00003208 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35727                                  
 35728 0000320A 56                      	push	si
 35729 0000320B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 35730 0000320E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 35731 00003210 5E                      	pop	si
 35732 00003211 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 35733 00003214 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 35734 00003217 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 35735 00003219 F9                      	stc
 35736 0000321A CD21                    	int	21h
 35737 0000321C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35738                                  
 35739 0000321E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 35740 00003220 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 35741                                  
 35742 00003222 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 35743 00003225 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 35744 00003228 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 35745 0000322A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 35746 0000322B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 35747 0000322C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 35748 00003230 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35749                                  
 35750                                  	;if	bugfix
 35751 00003232 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 35752                                  	;endif
 35753                                  
 35754 00003235 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 35755 00003237 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 35756                                  
 35757 00003239 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 35758                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 35759 0000323D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 35760                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 35761                                  	
 35762 00003241 57                      	push	di			;save di
 35763                                  
 35764 00003242 50                      	push	ax
 35765 00003243 2EA1[1B34]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 35766 00003247 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 35767 0000324A 58                      	pop	ax
 35768                                  
 35769                                  setdoscntry_mov:
 35770 0000324B F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy the table into dos
 35771 0000324D 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 35772 0000324F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 35773                                  
 35774 00003251 5F                      	pop	di			;restore di
 35775 00003252 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 35776                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 35777 00003256 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 35778                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 35779                                  
 35780                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 35781 0000325A 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 35782 0000325B 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 35783 0000325C 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 35784 0000325D 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 35785 0000325F 46                      	inc	si
 35786 00003260 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 35787 00003261 49                      	dec	cx
 35788 00003262 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 35789 00003265 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 35790 00003267 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 35791                                  
 35792                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35793                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 35794                                  	;retn
 35795                                  
 35796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35797                                  
 35798                                  	;if	bugfix
 35799                                  
 35800                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 35801 0000326A 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 35802 0000326C 7516                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 35803 0000326E 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 35804 00003272 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 35805                                  
 35806 00003274 57                      	push	di
 35807 00003275 50                      	push	ax
 35808 00003276 51                      	push	cx
 35809 00003277 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		; load block length
 35810 0000327A 83C702                  	add	di,2			; points actual data
 35811 0000327D 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; fill bytes
 35812 0000327F F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; clear data block
 35813 00003281 59                      	pop	cx
 35814 00003282 58                      	pop	ax
 35815 00003283 5F                      	pop	di
 35816                                  sdbcsbc:
 35817                                  setdoscntry_ok:	; 18/12/2022	
 35818 00003284 C3                      	retn
 35819                                  
 35820                                  	;endif

 35823                                  
 35824                                  getcountrydestination:
 35825                                  
 35826                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 35827                                  ;input: al - data id
 35828                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35829                                  ;on return:
 35830                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 35831                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 35832                                  
 35833 00003285 51                      	push	cx
 35834                                  	;add	di,74
 35835 00003286 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 35836                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 35837 00003289 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 35838 0000328C 47                      	inc	di
 35839 0000328D 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 35840                                  
 35841                                  getcntrydest:
 35842 0000328E 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 35843 00003291 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 35844 00003293 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 35845 00003297 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 35846                                  
 35847 00003299 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 35848 0000329C EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 35849                                  
 35850                                  getcntrydest_1:
 35851                                  	;add	di,41
 35852 0000329E 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 35853                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 35854 000032A1 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 35855 000032A3 F9                      	stc
 35856 000032A4 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 35857                                  
 35858                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 35859 000032A6 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 35860 000032A8 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 35861                                  
 35862 000032AA 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 35863 000032AB EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 35864                                  
 35865                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 35866 000032AD 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 35867                                  
 35868                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 35869 000032B1 59                      	pop	cx
 35870 000032B2 C3                      	retn
 35871                                  
 35872                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35873                                  
 35874                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 35875                                  
 35876                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 35877                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 35878                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 35879                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 35880                                  ;	 be moved.
 35881                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 35882                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 35883                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 35884                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 35885                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 35886                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 35887                                  
 35888 000032B3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 35889 000032B4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35890 000032B7 F9                      	stc
 35891 000032B8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35892 000032BA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 35893 000032BB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 35894                                  
 35895 000032BD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 35896 000032BF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35897 000032C1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 35898 000032C3 F9                      	stc
 35899 000032C4 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 35900                                  ricb_exit:
 35901 000032C6 C3                      	retn
 35902                                  
 35903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35904                                  
 35905                                  set_country_path:
 35906                                  
 35907                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 35908                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 35909                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 35910                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 35911                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 35912                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 35913                                  
 35914 000032C7 56                      	push	si
 35915                                  
 35916 000032C8 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 35917 000032C9 06                      	push	es
 35918 000032CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 35919 000032CB 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 35920                                  
 35921 000032CC E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 35922 000032CF 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 35923                                  
 35924 000032D1 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 35925 000032D3 46                      	inc	si
 35926 000032D4 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 35927 000032D5 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 35928                                  
 35929                                  scp_default_drv:
 35930 000032D7 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 35931 000032D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 35932 000032DB 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 35933                                  
 35934                                  scp_setdrv:
 35935 000032DD 2EA2[D033]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 35936 000032E1 BF[D333]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 35937 000032E4 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 35938 000032E6 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 35939 000032E8 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 35940                                  
 35941 000032EA 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 35942 000032EC 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 35943                                  
 35944 000032EE EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 35945                                  
 35946                                  scp_root_dir:
 35947 000032F0 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 35948                                  scp_path:
 35949 000032F1 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 35950                                  
 35951 000032F4 BF[D033]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 35952                                  scpath_exit:
 35953                                  
 35954 000032F7 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 35955 000032F8 06                      	push	es
 35956 000032F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 35957 000032FA 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 35958                                  
 35959 000032FB 5E                      	pop	si
 35960 000032FC C3                      	retn
 35961                                  
 35962                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35963                                  
 35964                                  chk_drive_letter:
 35965                                  
 35966                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 35967                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 35968                                  ;carry set if not.
 35969                                  
 35970 000032FD 50                      	push	ax
 35971 000032FE 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 35972                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 35973 00003301 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 35974 00003303 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 35975 00003306 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 35976 00003308 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 35977 0000330C 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 35978                                  
 35979 0000330E EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 35980                                  
 35981                                  cdletter_no:
 35982 00003310 F9                      	stc
 35983                                  cdletter_exit:
 35984 00003311 58                      	pop	ax
 35985 00003312 C3                      	retn
 35986                                  
 35987                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35988                                  
 35989                                  move_asciiz:
 35990                                  
 35991                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 35992                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 35993                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 35994                                  
 35995                                  masciiz_loop:
 35996 00003313 A4                      	movsb
 35997 00003314 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 35998 00003318 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 35999 0000331A C3                      	retn
 36000                                  
 36001                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36002                                  
 36003                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 36004                                  ;
 36005                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 36006                                  
 36007                                  badfil:
 36008 0000331B 0E                      	push	cs
 36009 0000331C 07                      	pop	es
 36010                                  
 36011 0000331D 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 36012                                  badload:
 36013 0000331F BA[5B37]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 36014 00003322 BB[1837]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 36015                                  prnerr:
 36016 00003325 0E                      	push	cs
 36017 00003326 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 36018 00003327 E81D00                  	call	print
 36019                                  prn1:
 36020 0000332A 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 36021 0000332D 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 36022 0000332F 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 36023 00003331 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 36024 00003333 CD21                    	int	21h
 36025 00003335 46                      	inc	si
 36026 00003336 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 36027                                  prn2:
 36028 00003338 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 36029 0000333A E80A00                  	call	print
 36030                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36031                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 36032 0000333D 803E[D103]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1 ; suppress line number when handling command.com
 36033                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 36034 00003342 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 36035                                  	
 36036                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36037                                  	;call	error_line
 36038 00003344 E9CFF3                  	jmp	error_line
 36039                                  ;prnexit:
 36040                                  	;retn

 36044                                  print:
